column434: Welcome to this stunning  Cabrini townhouse!   This remodeled home boasts incredible views and is ready for you to call it HOME.  The spacious kitchen has been completely renovated with gorgeous quartz counters, beautiful tile, and stainless steel appliances. The main level offers an open concept design with a dining area, recessed lighting, cozy fireplace, and a patio that overlooks the breathtaking views. Upstairs, you'll find two bedrooms, one of which offers stunning views of the valley. The garage level of this home offers a bonus room that's perfect for a home gym, storage, or office, and there's also a direct access private 2-car garage. Brand new A/C  unit installed in 2023 and new water heater installed in 2021.  But that's not all - the Cabrini Villas community has 7 sparkling pools, tennis courts, pickle ball court, a park, playground, spas, sauna, basketball court, and a recreation room. Plus, the HOA fees include water, cable, and internet, as well as around-the-clock security patrols. Don't miss out on the opportunity to make this stunning townhouse your new home. Remember that this is a Burbank zip code, but is located in the city of Los Angeles, and has all Los Angeles city services including schools and utilities.

column434: Welcome to one of the best-located homes in Cabrini Villas, offering the perfect balance of comfort, style, and convenience. This desirable corner unit features 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, and nearly 1,500 sqft of light-filled living space with a thoughtful layout that feels open and inviting. The main level showcases a spacious living room, dining area, and a well-appointed kitchen with granite countertops and plenty of cabinet space. Recessed lighting and double-pane windows enhance the warm, peaceful atmosphere throughout. Upstairs, the primary suite offers a bright retreat with a skylit walk-in closet and private bath, while two additional bedrooms share abundant natural light. The home's unique staircase design, highlighted by multiple skylights, fills the space with sunshine and architectural charm. An attached two-car garage provides direct access, laundry hookups, and a versatile bonus room ideal for a home gym, office, or studio. Both stairways are equipped with motorized lift seats, adding ease and accessibility. Enjoy resort-style living with Cabrini Villas' many amenities including multiple pools, tennis courts, playgrounds, park areas, a clubhouse, and 24-hour security patrol all within minutes of Downtown Burbank, shopping, dining, studios, and the 5 Freeway.A rare opportunity to own one of Cabrini Villas' most private and desirable townhomes where comfort and convenience meet in one of Burbank's most beloved communities.

column434: Exquisite European Modern Townhome in the Coveted Cabrini Villas.  Discover elevated hillside living in this stunning, newly remodeled townhome nestled within the prestigious Cabrini Villas community. Thoughtfully redesigned with impeccable attention to detail, this European modern masterpiece offers the perfect balance of sophistication and comfort, featuring 3 bedrooms, 2.5 luxurious baths, and nearly 1,500 square feet of refined living space.  Step inside to the large living room adorned with custom wall finishes, designer tile flooring, and a bespoke bar area, creating the perfect setting for both relaxation and entertaining. The formal dining area seamlessly flows into a state-of-the-art chef’s kitchen, showcasing quartz countertops, premium stainless steel appliances, and sleek custom cabinetry—an entertainer’s dream.  Enjoy seamless indoor-outdoor living with an oversized private patio, ideal for al fresco dining and tranquil evenings under the stars. The home also includes a two-car attached garage with a bonus room, perfect for a home office, gym, or creative studio.  Additional features include custom window treatments, recessed lighting and crown molding throughout.  Residents of Cabrini Villas indulge in resort-style amenities, including multiple sparkling pools and spas, tennis and basketball courts, playgrounds, and lushly landscaped grounds. Conveniently located just minutes from Downtown Burbank, premier shopping, dining, and major freeways, this home offers a rare combination of luxury, lifestyle, and location.  Experience hillside living at its finest—modern elegance meets timeless comfort.

column434: Welcome to 9555 Via Venezia. This 3-bedroom, 3 bath fixer-upper corner unit in the highly sought-after Cabrini Villas of Burbank offers a rare combination of space, privacy, and hillside views. Tucked away in a quiet part of the community, this townhome is ideal for those seeking comfort, convenience, and the chance to add their personal touch. Step inside to find an open-concept layout that connects the spacious living room and dining area, designed for both everyday living and entertaining. The living room features a fireplace and opens to a covered patio, perfect for morning coffee or evening relaxation. Upstairs, the primary bedroom includes a walk-in closet, private balcony, and an en-suite bath with a walk-in shower. Two additional bedrooms provide flexible space for guests, family, or a home office, and share a full hallway bathroom. Downstairs, a bonus room offers space for storage or a small office, adjacent to the two-car garage. This home is a fixer-upper opportunity, well suited for those looking to customize and build equity over time. HOA dues include water, sewer, cable, high-speed internet, and exterior maintenance for a low-maintenance lifestyle. It’s a rare chance to own a corner unit in Cabrini Villas with privacy, views, and plenty of potential. As a resident you'll enjoy 24-hr security, 7 swimming pools, 4 Jacuzzis, 6 tennis courts, basketball and volleyball courts, a playground, clubhouse, and a park.

column434: Here is a prime opportunity to buy a house with TWO large lots in South Sunland, located at the end of McGroarty and there are views!. Tax records show that the house is 219 sf and built in 1920. It has all the necessary things- a kitchen, a bathroom, a bedroom and living area-- but it's very compact and needs some TLC for sure. There is water and electricity, and it's connected to sewers. The land has a downslope but there are level areas to build on it.  There is so much potential here for a contractor, developer, or a handy homeowner who wants to create their dream oasis. Parcel 1 is 22,268 sf and has the house on it, Parcel 2 is 18,349 for a total of 40,617 square feet. Both parcels are included in the sale and must be sold together.

column533: TO VIEW THIS HOME AND LAND, PLEASE CALL US AT 818-570-2332. Here is a prime opportunity to buy a house with TWO large lots in South Sunland, located at the end of McGroarty and there are views!. Tax records show that the house is 219 sf and built in 1920. It has all the necessary things- a kitchen, a bathroom, a bedroom and living area-- but it's very compact and needs some TLC for sure. There is water and electricity, and it's connected to sewers. The land has a downslope but there are level areas to build on it.  There is so much potential here for a contractor, developer, or a handy homeowner who wants to create their dream oasis. Parcel 1 is 22,268 sf and has the house on it, Parcel 2 is 18,349 for a total of 40,617 square feet. Both parcels are included in the sale and must be sold together.

column434: Fall in love with this adorable single story home with peaceful mountain views nestled in the beautiful Foothills. A flowing floor plan offers room and private spaces for everyone. Sliding doors in three of the four bedrooms each open to private seating areas. Catch the peaceful mountain views from so many places on the property, at sunset they are golden.  The 4th bedroom is situated at the west end of the home with its own kitchenette and living room, ideal as an in-law suite or for extended family. The sliding door off the family room could easily be turned into a separate entrance.  A charming wood bench/eat-in kitchen and a breakfast bar/counter open to the living room, giving a spacious and welcoming feel. A sliding door off the nicely sized living room opens to a concrete patio area perfect for afternoon barbecues or sipping morning coffee. There are also covered washer and dryer hookups. Regarding the systems, a newer roof, 2 water heaters - (one 40 gallon Reliance and one 40 gallon Rheem brand), copper plumbing and an upgraded electrical panel are a bonus. Toward the back is a storage shed to keep outdoor cushions, gardening supplies, holiday decor and more. The spacious front yard offers so many places to relax and enjoy year round outdoor living. There is also a gravel area in front that can conveniently be used as additional room for parking. The gated yard is perfect for pets and little ones to play. This Home Sweet Home offers a great opportunity for you to add your personal touches and make it your own!

column434: Welcome to 10742 Sharon Ave, a beautifully updated 3-bedroom, 2-bath home blending character, comfort, and California charm. Built in 1959 and thoughtfully refreshed, this 1,317 sq ft residence sits on a peaceful lot in one of Sunland's most inviting neighborhoods. Step inside to a bright, open living space with brand new laminate flooring, recessed lighting, and plantation shutters. The modern kitchen features crisp white cabinetry and quartz countertops, while the primary suite offers vaulted ceilings, custom windows, and abundant natural light. Freshly painted inside and out, this home includes a new roof, newer double-pane windows, copper plumbing, a 200-amp electrical panel, and a tankless water heater for true move-in readiness. Two additional bedrooms provide flexible space for guests or a home office. Outside, enjoy a private backyard with mountain views, lush landscaping, mature trees, and a charming garden shed--all just moments from parks, trails, and local favorites.

column434: Welcome to 10623 Woodward Avenue! This is not just any house; it's the mid-century modern home of a popular design influencer, where sleek style blends perfectly with everyday functionality. The sellers have moved out, creating a fresh canvas for its next chapter. Inside, you'll find 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, plus a versatile bonus room that's ready for whatever you want - home office, studio, gym, or guest space. Significant upgrades include: solar panels, a Level 2 car charger, a 200 amp panel, and a new sump pump. The living room is highlighted by a striking post and beam ceiling, while the upgraded kitchen boasts custom steel shelving and backsplash, ideal for cooking and entertaining. The property is filled with unique features such as clerestory stained glass windows, solid birch veneer doors, a stylish sliding door on a track, and custom window shades. It also includes built-in closets and steel planters, adding charm to both inside and out.  Included with the home are chic appliances like a SMEG refrigerator and dishwasher, and a KUTCH oven with colorful interchangeable doors. The garden is lush with native California and drought-resistant plants that flourish with minimal watering. Aromatic plants like lavender, sage, and rosemary create a welcoming atmosphere, complemented by a majestic Palo Verde tree. This remarkable home has been showcased in prestigious publications such as Domino Magazine, Apartment Therapy, and The Los Angeles Times. It has also been featured on HGTV and YouTube's "Creating Spaces" with Ryan Serhant. Don't miss your opportunity to own a piece of influencer luxury living!

column434: This charming 3-bedroom, 2-bath home nestled in the foothills of Sunland, where peaceful living meets LA convenience. This inviting residence blends mid-century character with thoughtful updates, offering a warm and comfortable atmosphere throughout. Step inside to discover a bright, open living room with hardwood floors, recessed lighting, and a cozy fireplace that anchors the space. The galley-style kitchen features solid oak cabinetry, tile countertops, and stainless steel appliances, ready for everyday cooking or entertaining. Adjacent to the main living area is a spacious bonus room with slate flooring, exposed wood beams, and a freestanding wood-burning stove, perfect for gatherings, a home office, or a creative studio. The bedrooms are light-filled and well-proportioned, while both bathrooms maintain their original charm, including vintage tilework that adds a touch of nostalgia. Outside, enjoy your own private backyard retreat with a newly built wooden pergola, lush landscape, and mountain views, a great spot for morning coffee or evening dining. Located on a quiet street yet close to it all, minutes from Foothill Blvd’s local cafés, hiking trails, parks, and easy freeway access, this home is ideal for anyone seeking tranquility without sacrificing convenience. Whether you’re a first-time buyer, downsizing, or looking for a home with character and space to grow, Forsythe offers timeless appeal and everyday comfort in one of Sunland’s most beloved neighborhoods.

column434: Welcome to this charming 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home in the heart of Sunland. Fully fenced for added privacy and security, this property offers a perfect balance of comfort and functionality. A spacious driveway leads to the attached 2-car garage, providing plenty of parking. The front yard features a low-maintenance desert-style landscape with beautiful plants that enhance its curb appeal. Inside, the home boasts a recently remodeled kitchen and dining area, complete with updated countertops, cabinets, and tile flooring. The rest of the home is finished with sleek laminate floors, while the bathrooms feature durable tile. The bright and inviting living room is filled with natural light from large windows and includes direct access to the backyard. Step outside to enjoy a private oasis—an expansive backyard with a sparkling pool and plenty of open space, ideal for relaxing or entertaining. There is also a bonus bathroom!  Additional upgrades include a brand-new HVAC system, replaced just six months ago, ensuring year-round comfort. This Sunland gem combines modern updates, outdoor enjoyment, and everyday convenience—ready for you to call home!

column434: Welcome to this charming 3-bedroom, 2-bath home nestled in the heart of Sunland, right on the border of Tujunga. Enter inside to an inviting open floor plan filled with natural sunlight, featuring a cozy living room with a beautiful fireplace and double-pane windows. The home has been freshly painted and offers carpet throughout. The kitchen is designed with functionality in mind, showcasing granite countertops, plenty of cabinetry, and ample counter space, complemented by elegant tile flooring. A spacious master bedroom with abundant natural light provides the perfect retreat, while the secondary bedrooms offer high ceilings and generous closet space. The bathrooms have been refreshed with a toilet tank and sink. Enjoy the convenience of central A/C and heating, a detached laundry room with washer and dryer included, and a versatile bonus room ideal for a home office or studio. The backyard is perfect for entertaining, featuring a large covered patio, lush green lawn, and the tranquil sounds of birdsong. A spacious shed provides extra storage, while the detached garage and gated U-shaped driveway offer ample parking—including space for an RV or boat. Sitting on a 7,464 sq ft lot, the property boasts a beautifully maintained front yard with mini palm trees and vibrant landscaping. The location is unbeatable—close to Starbucks, Vons, local restaurants, bakeries, schools, medical centers, and more. This home is the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and charm—ideal as your next residence or investment property. You will love calling 7848 Forsythe St home.

column434: Nestled on a quiet Sunland street and set slightly above the road in the foothills of the San Gabriel Mountains, this inviting ranch-style home blends classic character with thoughtful modern touches. An open, light-filled layout showcases newly poured concrete floors, recessed lighting, and a mid-century fireplace anchoring the living room. A set of French doors opens to a covered rear patio and a spacious, usable lot  an ideal canvas for gardening, a future pool or ADU, or your own outdoor retreat. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances and generous cabinetry, while the tranquil primary suite provides a peaceful private escape. Two additional bedrooms and a full bath offer flexibility for guests, a home office, or creative space. From the front yard, enjoy leafy treetop and canyon outlooks that capture the natural beauty of the surrounding hills. With lush landscaping and a classic white picket fence, this home offers warmth, charm, and room to grow  all just moments from Burbank, Glendale, and La Crescenta. A serene hillside getaway in Sunland, perfectly placed to enjoy both nature and city convenience.

column434: One-of-a-Kind Sunland Gem with Stunning Views and Endless Possibilities! Nestled in the desirable hills of Sunland on a friendly, quiet, peaceful, tree-lined street, this exceptional home offers privacy, space, and breathtaking mountain views from nearly every window. Set on a generous 8,216 sq. ft. lot, this home boasts approximately 1,997 sq. ft. of living space and a layout designed for both family living and entertaining. Featuring 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, the charming floor plan includes a bright living room with a beautiful stone fireplace with a gas line, a spacious family room, and newly installed quality laminate flooring throughout. Three bedrooms are conveniently located on the main floor, while the lower level offers a versatile bedroom/family room, a full bath, and a large connecting utility basement—perfect for conversion into an additional bedroom, playroom, or man cave with kitchen and bathroom. Put your own touch and make it special!!! Imagine transforming the oversized backyard into your private oasis with a pool, jacuzzi, gazebo, waterfall, custom BBQ area, green house and more.  The property has two street access-one on Glenties Ln and the other on Glenties Way. With access from Glenties Way, there is potential to build two ADUs, duplex or a guest house for extended family or for additional income. There is plenty of room to park an RV, boat, or additional vehicles. Additional highlights include: New central air conditioning and heating with ductwork, Upgraded 200-amp electrical panel, Connected sewer, Oversized two-car garage plus private driveway Perfectly located for commuting and lifestyle, you are just minutes away from supermarkets, restaurants, and good schools. Enjoy quick access to Downtown Burbank, Glendale Galleria, Old Town Pasadena, the NOHO District, and world-famous LA attractions like the Music Center, Disney Music Hall, Hollywood Bowl, SoFi Stadium, Crypto Arena, and Kia Forum. Sellers willing to help buyers for 2/1 buy down low rate, buyer might save  about$1,000 / month, or get a permanent buy down rate. This treasured home radiates comfort, warmth, and family-friendly charm. Priced below market, it is a rare opportunity in Sunland’s hot market and will not last long. Make this unique property your own and create memories that will last a lifetime!

column434: Investor Special - priced below market! This is a Fixer-Upper with potential equity gaining opportunity in a highly desirable neighborhood! Whether you're looking to flip. renovate, expand, or rebuild, the possibilities are endless - Bring your imagination and transform this gem! This Private gated house is in the desirable Shadow Hills/Sunland area! Sitting on a spacious 15,557 sq/ft lot, this property features a two-story 4 bedroom, 4 bathroom main house that needs major remodeling along with a separate spacious (~1200 sq/ft) 1-bedroom ADU. As you walk through the gate and up the gentle slope, you'll find the very large 1-bedroom ADU, complete with an outdoor sitting area. Inside, it features a full bathroom with a regular tub, a balcony and a spacious bedroom.   Heading up to the main house, the first floor offers a ~1200 sq/ft 1-bedroom /1 bath layout with its own hot tub, a laundry room - a large space perfect for a Rental. The outside staircase leads to the second floor, where you're greeted by high ceilings with potential LED lighting, a sunroof that fills the space with natural light, a separate laundry room, and a well-sized kitchen, a private hot tub, and even a cozy sunroom - perfect for relaxation.  The living room seamlessly opens up through sliding glass doors to the private backyard, creating an inviting indoor/outdoor flow with beautiful greenery, scenic views and plenty of natural light. This property is ideal for buyers seeking a project to customize into a multi-generational residence, income-producing rental property, or a stunning estate. Prime location with strong buyer demand - ideal for all buyers, contractors and developers. Nestled on a spacious (0.36-acre) lot, the home is ready for a complete renovation or rebuild, giving you the chance to customize every detail to your taste. Conveniently located near freeways, schools, shopping, and dining, it combines great potential with an excellent location. This is your chance to turn a diamond in the rough into a stunning property - opportunities like this don't come often! With some updates and improvements this home could shine again! CALLING ALL VISIONARIES - unlock this home's true potential.  PROPERTY SOLD AS/IS - seller will make no repairs or credits.

column434: Welcome to Riverwood Ranch, a private gated ranch community in NE Los Angeles.  This 3-acre horse property sits on the edge of the breathtaking Angeles National Forest, a serene retreat offering the perfect balance of rustic charm and modern comfort, just minutes from the city yet worlds away. Whether you’re a horse enthusiast, a creative soul looking for space and inspiration, a nature lover, or simply someone who craves privacy and peace  – this is a property that speaks for itself.  The charming main residence offers cozy living with a high efficiency wood burning fireplace for winter nights, 3 bedrooms with 1 being an en-suite plus 1 more bathroom.  Newer roof, HVAC, electrical and interior paint.  Infrastructure to add solar.  Fire suppression system.  The property is dotted with mature oaks, pine, eucalyptus, cotton wood, pepper trees, native landscaping, and open skies that make every sunrise and sunset unforgettable.  7 citrus trees, blackberries, strawberries, pomegranate, plum and fruit bearing olive trees for the gardener – complete with a greenhouse with water and electricity plus a chicken coop.  Magical golden hours when the hills light up with the setting sun, leading to an evening of relaxing in the jacuzzi and infrared & steam sauna, overlooking the babbling Koi pond.  For the equestrian, currently house 4 horses with the possibility of 6-8 more near the 60 foot round pen, direct access to hundreds of miles of trails in Angeles National Forest for beginner to advanced riders:  Fascination Springs Trail, Doc Larsen Trail, Eby Canyon (Pipeline)Trail, Rattlesnake Trail.  Saddle up and ride!  Peaceful.  Secluded.  Inspiring.  Properties like this rarely come available—don’t miss the opportunity to own a piece of California’s hidden ranch community, just beyond the city limits.  Getaway to the mountains yet just 20-30 minutes to Burbank, Glendale, Pasadena and DTLA.

column434: Welcome to your own hilltop hideaway in Shadow Hills! Tucked away, this beautiful three-level home offers a rare combination of total privacy, abundant natural light, and incredible 360° views. Whether you’re sipping coffee as the morning sun rises over the mountains or watching the city lights twinkle at night, the scenery here never stops impressing. With 3,144 sq ft of thoughtfully designed living space, you’ll find 4 spacious bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, and plenty of room to spread out and make yourself at home. The most recently renovated first-floor room and bathroom offer a versatile space—perfect for a game room, large office, or guest area—with a walk-in shower featuring double shower heads. The bright, open layout is filled with large windows that flood every room with sunshine and frame sweeping views from nearly every angle. Multiple fireplaces add a cozy, welcoming touch, perfect for gathering with family and friends on cool evenings. The kitchen offers generous space for cooking and entertaining, ready for everything from easy weekday breakfasts to festive holiday dinners. Hardwood, tile, and carpet flooring flow throughout the home, creating a comfortable blend of elegance and warmth. Each level offers its own unique perspective on the surrounding landscape, making every space feel special. Outside, your 1.05-acre lot is a blank canvas for whatever you dream up—whether it’s a sparkling pool, a lush garden, or a stylish guest house for visiting family and friends. There’s space to entertain, relax, and soak in the serenity all year round. Here, you’ll enjoy the best of both worlds: peaceful, private living with easy access to the amenities, shops, and dining of the surrounding communities. This is more than just a house—it’s a lifestyle, and it’s a rare opportunity to own one of Shadow Hills’ most scenic properties.

column434: Introducing 10608 Johanna Avenue, an updated home and horse property located in the premium Shadow Hills neighborhood. Upon ascending a long, private driveway lined with mature trees, an electric gate opens to reveal the home's serene entrance with a statement stone chimney. Designed for an indoor outdoor lifestyle, French doors expand the living, dining and bedroom toward a wrap-around deck immersed in greenery. The living room's natural light and gas fireplace creates an inviting atmosphere throughout the day and into the evening, while the kitchen's modern charm features Samsung appliances including a smart gas range, fridge and dishwasher, along with a farmhouse sink, detailed backsplash and Dutch door. Additional highlights include central heating and cooling with Nest thermostat. The property's detached structures offer a second bedroom with mini split heating and cooling, Castlebook Barn, large storage area, and chicken coop. In balancing both a calm, rural community with urban convenience, residents of Shadow Hills enjoy one of Los Angeles' most diverse outdoor lifestyles with immediate access to horse trails, hiking, water recreation, golf and more while situated only 6.5 miles from the Hollywood Burbank Airport and 8 miles from Burbank's city center. It is also among the few remaining equestrian-zoned communities in Los Angeles as well. Stretching across a tiered 0.45 acre lot, the property offers rare, flexible access from both Johanna Avenue to the west and McBroom Street to the east.

column434: Step into timeless charm reimagined for modern living. This beautifully renovated Mellenthin home in the heart of Shadow Hills preserves the signature “bird-house ranch” architecture that defines these rare treasures — pitched rooflines, picture windows, and inviting indoor/outdoor flow. Every detail has been thoughtfully renewed: a brand-new kitchen with contemporary cabinetry and stainless-steel appliances, fully updated bathrooms, new flooring, new roof and fresh designer finishes that blend classic warmth with today’s comfort.  Enough room to park all your toys, boat, RV and more. Natural light pours through the many windows, creating an airy ambiance that complements the open-concept living areas. Multiple patios and outdoor gathering spaces invite you to enjoy California living at its best — from morning coffee to sunset dinners with mountain views. Located in a desirable equine community, this property welcomes horse lovers with easy access to local riding trails and stables. Bonus: This offering includes a second parcel with its own driveway — perfect for building an ADU or creating a horse stable. Whether you’re drawn by the history, the craftsmanship, or the lifestyle, this home offers the perfect blend of heritage, heart, and harmony.

column434: An amazing single story home in the highly coveted Lake View Terrace is now available! This spacious home sits on a quiet cul-de-sac on a large lot backing a beautiful hillside, offering a peaceful neighborhood feel while still being just minutes from the 210 Freeway with quick access to La Canada, Glendale, and Pasadena. At 1,742 square feet, it features 3 bedrooms plus a den and 2 bathrooms, a large lot with a swimming pool, and numerous recent upgrades including a new roof with upgraded fire-code vents and screens, brand new gutters, a new A/C condenser, a new hot water heater, updated electrical and panel, a Tesla EV charger and more. The home includes beautiful wood flooring throughout, fresh paint, new hardware on all doors and cabinets, updated sink and faucet hardware in the kitchen and bathrooms, a custom double built-in desk with soft-close drawers and cabinets in the 4th room, and a kitchen equipped with new stainless steel appliances. The backyard offers a swimming pool and spa with a new pool vacuum and filter that have been professionally maintained weekly since purchase, along with a large shed. The lot provides versatility and charm with a two-car garage, additional driveway parking, a long side parking area that can accommodate an RV or boat, and fruit trees on the opposite side, and prospective buyers may explore the potential for an Accessory Dwelling Unit (ADU). Nestled in the picturesque Foothills, Lake View Terrace offers convenient access to the 210 and 118 Freeways, equestrian trails, Hansen Dam, the Angeles National Golf Course, and a variety of other nearby amenities. Don't miss your chance to view this amazing home, schedule your showing today.

column434: Courtship Ranch - Historic Equestrian Facility in Shadow Hills/Lake View TerraceNestled at the base of Oliver Canyon, between Little Tujunga and Big Tujunga, Courtship Ranch is a historic and well-regarded equestrian facility located in the heart of the Shadow Hills/Lake View Terrace community. This prime location offers seamless access to northern Los Angeles, attracting clients from Pasadena, Burbank, Glendale, Hollywood, La Canada, and San Fernando.Set on just under 7 acres, Courtship Ranch has been a continuous boarding operation since the 1970s, offering a comprehensive range of high-end facilities designed for active equestrians. The property features 77 stalls, 8 pasture turnouts, and 3 lighted arenas, including a large and covered arena with a full dressage court, providing shade, rain protection, and the ability for night riding. In addition to the arenas, the property includes 11 tack rooms, wash racks, and ample hay storage, ensuring convenience and efficiency for both horses and owners. The Ranch welcomes a variety of riding styles and offers excellent trail riding opportunities, allowing riders to enjoy the natural beauty of the area.The property includes a charming 5-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom home with 1,895 square feet of living space and a well-maintained in-ground swimming pool, offering the perfect retreat for owners or staff. A standout feature of the home is the over 200-year-old California Fig tree, which, according to local legend, served as a waypoint on the Wells Fargo Butterfield Overland mail route. This historic tree adds a unique touch of charm and history to the property.Courtship Ranch has a proven history of profitability, with 15 years of detailed financials available for review, demonstrating a track record of success. The current owners are open to consulting with the new owners, offering valuable insight into the facility's operations, client relationships, and maintenance practices to ensure a smooth transition.The ranch is protected by a permanent Conditional Use Permit and has built strong, longstanding relationships with the local community, veterinarians, and farriers, who frequently refer new clients to the facility. Whether for daily training or special events, the facility is well-equipped to handle all equestrian activities.Courtship Ranch is a rare opportunity for any equestrian enthusiast or investor seeking a well-established, profitable facility with room for growth, a strong community presence, and endless possibilities for further expansion. This is your chance to own a piece of equestrian history in one of Southern California's most desirable and accessible locations.More information can be found at https://courtshipranch.com/

Built in 1969, this 1,660 sq ft residence sits on a generous 5,729 sq ft lot and is in MOVE-IN-CONDITION. The living room also boasts a charming brick fireplace, perfect for cozy gatherings. Furthermore, the home features RECESSED LIGHTING throughout. Natural light fills the living area, which flows seamlessly into the formal dining space—perfect for entertaining. Step outside to enjoy a large backyard with an enclosed patio, ideal for outdoor gatherings. Conveniently located near Costco, major shopping centers, schools, Hansen Dam Recreational area and golf course, and multiple freeways for an easy commute. Don’t miss your chance to call this Pacoima gem your new home!

column434: Welcome to this charming 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom single-story pool home on a spacious corner lot in Arleta. The large, gated front yard features a combination of pavers and lush artificial grass—perfect for relaxing or entertaining—along with orange, pomegranate and lime trees. Inside, a formal entryway opens to a warm living room with beautiful real wood floors and a bright sunroom, ideal as a flex or lounge space. The dining area flows seamlessly into the kitchen, which showcases stunning tilework, a double-basin sink beneath a sunny bay window, resurfaced cabinets, and a newer range hood. Off the kitchen, a convenient laundry room connects to both the backyard and the primary suite with an adjoining bathroom. On the opposite side of the home, two additional bedrooms—each with ceiling fans and double-door closets—share a full bathroom featuring a refinished tub. The backyard offers a sparkling blue-tiled pool and a converted detached two-car garage with its own entrance, vinyl flooring, dual closets, and an AC unit—ideal for an ADU, home gym, or office. A large side security gate provides easy, private access to the garage and backyard, with plenty of room for parking. Recent upgrades include fresh interior and exterior paint, a newer pool pump, updated AC system with copper repiping, and a new water heater closet. With close proximity to the 5 and 170 freeways, parks, shopping, and dining, this move-in ready home perfectly combines comfort, functionality, and convenience.

column434: Situated on a generous 8,395 sq ft lot, this residence presents an exceptional opportunity for an Accessory Dwelling Unit (ADU) addition, offering both flexibility and income potential. This beautiful Arleta home has just been remodeled from Top To Bottom, and the owner paid painstaking attention to every detail. Here are just a few of its many other fine features: ornate wrought iron fencing, lush landscaping, colorful planters, stone façade, and freshly painted exterior that enhances its eye-catching curb appeal. Step into a freshly painted 1,440 square foot open-concept floor plan. A spacious living room is bathed in natural light from a multitude of windows and features a mantled gas-burning fireplace with a raised hearth. The family’s cook is going to appreciate the kitchen’s large garden window, abundant new cabinets, ample quartz counters with full subway tile backsplash, durable dual-basin undermount sink, gas range with stainless steel ventilation hood, built-in stainless steel appliances, and adjoining dining area. There are three bedrooms; the grand suite offers direct patio access, a walk-in closet, and a beautifully appointed full bathroom. The large bonus room with direct patio access could be used as a fourth bedroom. A total of two bathrooms. Functionally located laundry. Central heat and air for year-round comfort. You’re going to appreciate the large backyard’s privacy fencing, covered entertainer’s patio, side patio, and shade trees. You’ll have absolutely no problem securely parking any and all of your vehicles and other toys off-street on the oversized driveway, in the attached garage, all behind the rolling security gate. Call now for all of the details, and I will gladly arrange your private tour.

column434: Welcome Home! Your Perfect Blend of Comfort, Style & Convenience Awaits! Step into this beautifully updated 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home located in a desirable, central neighborhood close to schools, shopping, and major freeways — perfect for both relaxation and accessibility. From the moment you arrive, you’ll love the fully fenced property featuring an automatic gate opener, pedestrian entrance, and a gate doorbell to welcome guests and deliveries. Parking is never an issue with a spacious two-car garage, long driveway, and ample street parking for family and friends. Inside, the charm continues with gleaming hardwood floors, a bright open-concept living and dining area, and a split-bedroom floor plan that provides ideal privacy for all. The updated modern kitchen boasts white cabinetry, a breakfast bar, and a brand-new stove, making it the perfect space to cook, chat, and entertain.  Both bathrooms have been thoughtfully designed.  Enjoy a walk-in shower for convenience and a porcelain tub for those long, relaxing soaks. A pocket door provides the option to separate the living area from the bedrooms for added comfort and quiet. Laundry day just got easier with a dedicated indoor laundry room — a rare find in this area! Step outside and discover your private oasis: a redwood deck, two redwood-covered pergolas, and a covered patio ready for outdoor dining, barbecues, or quiet morning coffee. The producing orange tree adds a sweet touch to your backyard retreat, and the blend of green space, hardscaping, and entertainment areas makes it perfect for every lifestyle. With fresh paint inside and out, a new water heater, new fencing, new front yard landscaping, and owned solar panels for energy savings, this home is move-in ready and designed for low-maintenance living. Don’t miss this opportunity! Homes like this — stylish, functional, and energy-efficient — don’t stay on the market long.

column434: Set on a quiet cul-de-sac type "loop" street, this charming single-family home offers 1,772 sq. ft. of comfortable living on a generous & gated 6,000 sq. ft. lot. Inside, you’ll find four bedrooms and two full baths, including a hallway bathroom with both a tub and a separate shower. The home’s open and welcoming layout features a modern fireplace and stylish luxury vinyl flooring throughout. The spacious fourth permitted bedroom at the back of the home doubles as a versatile flex space – perfect as a second living room, den, game room, or home office. Smart home features, including wireless cameras, add convenience and peace of mind. Out back, enjoy your private yard complete with mature Orange and Meyer Lemon trees – ideal for weekend gatherings or quiet mornings outdoors. A gated entry to the fenced property and extended driveway provide ample parking, with space for an RV. The attached two-car garage, with direct home access, is a dream for hobbyists, tinkerers, or car enthusiasts. Located near local markets, Canterbury Avenue Elementary & Gifted Magnet, and just minutes from the 5 and 170 freeways, this home combines comfort, versatility, and convenience in the heart of the Valley. Don’t miss the chance to make it yours!

column434: Opportunity knocks in the heart of Arleta! On the market for the first time in over 50 years, this beautifully maintained single-level gem is brimming with potential and ready for your personal touch. Nestled on a quiet, tree-lined street, this home is designed for both comfortable living and seamless entertaining with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a versatile bonus room, a dedicated dining area, and an oversized den—all situated on a generous 6,650 sqft lot. Step into a bright and welcoming living room filled with natural light from a picturesque bay window, perfect for a cozy reading nook. Just off the foyer, the bonus room features a built-in dual desk and cabinetry, ideal for a home office or playroom. Down the hall, you’ll discover 3 bedrooms including a primary suite tucked at the rear of the home for added privacy and complete with an en-suite bathroom and dual vanity. Tying the layout together, the den offers a warm and inviting space for gatherings with its exposed brick, cozy gas fireplace, built-in shelving, and sliding glass doors leading to your private outdoor oasis. The expansive backyard showcases a sparkling 12-foot-deep swimming pool that has been thoroughly updated, boasting new rebar, concrete, plaster, and equipment. A spacious covered patio creates the perfect setting for al fresco dining, summer gatherings, or simply relaxing poolside. This home features original hardwood floors, central AC, copper plumbing, two water heaters, ample guest parking, and a newer 30-year roof installed in 2018. With low maintenance landscaping throughout, an oversized gated driveway perfect for RV parking, and a detached two-car garage offering excellent ADU potential, this property combines functionality with opportunity. Conveniently located near shopping, dining, and entertainment, and just minutes from several family-friendly parks equipped with sports fields, gyms, tennis courts, and playgrounds, this home truly has it all. Don’t miss this rare opportunity to reimagine a cherished home in one of Arleta’s most sought-after neighborhoods—bring your vision and make it yours!

column434: Experience modern California living at its finest with a seamless blend of traditional charm and contemporary design. From the moment you arrive, the striking black entry doors set the tone, highlighting the contrast between the classic single-story main residence and the sleek two-story ADU. The main residence offers approx. 2,211 sq ft with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and features a bright open layout with elegant updates throughout. The spacious living and dining areas flow into the remodeled kitchen with quartz countertops, custom cabinetry, stainless-steel appliances, and a large breakfast bar ideal for gatherings. A gas fireplace adds warmth to the main living space. The serene primary suite offers a walk-in closet and an updated en-suite bath overlooking the pool. Additional bedrooms provide versatility for guests, family, or a home office. A hallway laundry area with cabinetry adds convenience. Upgrades include paid solar, updated electrical, a tankless water heater, EV charger, a newer roof, and a recently replastered pool, offering comfort, reliability, and efficiency. The outdoor space is an entertainer’s retreat with a sparkling pool and waterfall wall, modern firepit lounge, second firepit, and an expansive covered patio with a full outdoor kitchen equipped with a pizza oven, charcoal grill, refrigerator, freezer, beer tap, beverage bar, sink, and ample seating. A storage area with a shed and an outdoor shower add practicality. The side yard includes a third firepit, mature fruit trees, and space ideal for storage or potential JADU. The modern ADU, fully permitted with its own address and yard, features 2 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms with striking architectural design. The main level includes an open living area, a designer kitchen with waterfall-edge quartz, high-gloss cabinetry, premium LG appliances, a half bath, and in-unit laundry. Upstairs are two bedrooms—one en-suite and one with a hallway bath—each with private balconies and treetop views. With its own water sub-meter and strong Airbnb performance, the ADU offers excellent income potential or multigenerational living. Located on a quiet cul-de-sac surrounded by mature landscaping and natural privacy, this property delivers versatility, comfort, and a refined Southern California lifestyle, perfect for those seeking both function and elevated everyday living.

column7: There is an outstanding balance of approximately $18,000 for a recently completed special assessment. This assessment covered major upgrades, including the roof, asphalt, mailboxes, and security gates with cameras, and the seller will pay it in full at the close of escrow. The HOA covers water, Spectrum internet and cable, landscaping/grounds maintenance, and earthquake insurance. Community security gates automatically open at 6:00 AM and close at 9:00 PM. Though originally built in 1979, the entire community was extensively rehabbed following the 1994 Northridge earthquake. Property is being sold in AS-IS condition. Broker and agent do not guarantee the accuracy of square footage, bedroom/bathroom count, lot size, permits, or other property details. column7: Please call Sam at 1-818-6290-5128 for any and all showings. AS-IS No Repairs. A note from SRAR: Hello, Our Association, SRAR, uses only the Neighborhood Council boundaries to determine the city within L.A. City limits. Due to this, the area between Lassen and Devonshire and Balboa and the 405 is now (as of 8/2018) considered Granada Hills. Therefore, any listing entered within the Lassen, Devonshire, Balboa and 405 area must be entered as Granada Hills in our MLS. If an agent was to enter it as North Hills this would be a violation. You can also reference the Neighborhood Council website, GHSNC.org, for further details and a map. Thank you, Kayla Meeks Asst. Assessment Coordinator Southland Regional Association of Realtors7232 BALBOA BLVD * LAKE BALBOA CALIFORNIA

column434: Nestled on a generous, over 8000 sq ft corner lot in the heart of Granada Hills, this inviting 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,570 sq ft Southern California rambler blends timeless charm with modern comfort. Wonderful vintage façade, verdant lawn, curving drive with brick ribbons, and covered brick front porch create great curb appeal. Fresh paint, smooth ceilings, recessed lighting, and an open floorplan create a warm and airy feel from the moment you enter through the front door. The spacious living room features wood flooring, a classic brick fireplace, a large picture window. It is fully open to the adjoining dining are, with French doors that open to the covered patio, perfect for effortless indoor/outdoor living.  The space flows seamlessly into the well-appointed kitchen, offering tile flooring, quartz countertops, an convenient central island and built-in appliances. The attached utility room offers laundry facilities and direct yard access. Down the hall are all the bedrooms, including a spacious primary suite with an en-suite full bath with a walk-in bath. Three additional good-sized bedrooms share access to a ¾ hall bath, providing flexibility for family living, room for guests, office space, or hobbies.  The backyard is ideal for entertaining or relaxation, featuring a covered patio, lawn area, mature hillside landscaping, a large shade tree, and a storage shed. An attached 2-car garage as well as RV access with a dedicated concrete pad adds convenience.  Well situated near highly rated schools like Robert Frost Middle and Granada Hills Charter, shopping, dining, parks, and major freeways, this charming, well-cared-for residence offers comfort, functionality, and fantastic potential in one of Granada Hills’ most desirable neighborhoods.  Don’t miss out on this one!

column434: Nestled in one of Granada Hills’ most desirable neighborhoods, this beautifully updated single-story residence seamlessly blends modern comfort with versatile living. Featuring 5 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms, including a fully permitted one-bedroom, one-bath ADU with separate utilities, this home offers approximately 1,854 square feet of living space on a generous 7,801-square-foot lot. Step inside to an inviting, light-filled open floor plan adorned with large windows, stylish modern finishes, and thoughtfully designed spaces. The primary suite features dual en-suite baths, allowing for flexible living arrangements and added privacy. The main residence includes four bedrooms and three baths, while the detached ADU provides the perfect setup for multi-generational living or an excellent rental opportunity. Both the main home and ADU are equipped with paid-off solar panels, enhancing energy efficiency and reducing monthly costs. An electric gated entry offers added security and convenience, complemented by RV access, a gated driveway, and ample parking. The outdoor spaces are equally impressive, with a covered patio, paved entertaining areas, and beautifully landscaped yards offering a serene retreat. The kitchens boast granite countertops and tasteful modern upgrades throughout. Zoned LARD6 with no HOA, this property delivers the freedom and flexibility every homeowner desires. Ideally situated near major freeways, shopping, dining, and top-rated schools—including Haskell STEAM Magnet, George K. Porter Middle, and John F. Kennedy High—this home represents the perfect balance of lifestyle, location, and investment potential. Don’t miss the chance to own this exceptional Granada Hills gem—schedule your private showing today!

column434: An exquisite, ultra-private entertainers home awaits you in the prestigious community of Knollwood Estates. This stunning immaculate 6 bedroom/7 bath home is full of character and charm. A modern feel with a twist of Mid Century. Super private 17, 358 sq/ft lot, that is set back off the street, allowing for tree top and city views. The moment you walk in you are greeted by the mesmerizing wood beamed vaulted ceilings and the view of the relaxing pool and treetops beyond the oversized glass sliders. Large eat in kitchen with center island, tons of cabinets/storage and stainless steel appliances. Butlers’ kitchen/pantry area is strategically situated with commercial-style fridge, sink, double oven and more storage. 2 primary suites one at each wing of the home. 1st Primary suite is located upstairs with skylights, oversized seating area, wrap-around walk-in closet , heated bathroom floors and balcony with amazing city & pool views. 2nd primary suite located on the main level also has relaxing views of the pool & tree tops, ample windows/glass sliders, oversized walk-in closet, his and hers bathrooms and even a relaxing/meditation outdoor area created off master bath. Enhance your health with your very own private infrared sauna! All bedrooms are good sized with plenty of storage space. Entertainers yard with heated pool, covered patio area, outdoor bathroom w/shower and several different areas to entertain throughout the large lot. NO detail has been spared. Some other features include oversized double fireplace, 3 HVAC zones, paid off/owned solar, exterior roll down blinds and so much more.

column434: Welcome to one of the most spectacular single-story, ranch style custom estates in Knollwood! The moment you arrive, the striking curb appeal sets the tone—beautiful rock hardscaping leads to a private, gated courtyard with serene fountain and tranquil seating areas that greet you. Step through custom wood double doors w/beveled glass and discover nearly 4,300 sq. ft. of luxurious living space. Upon entry you immediately notice the views of the resort-like backyard through the oversized sliding glass doors of the spacious and bright living room that has custom built-ins and fireplace. At the heart of the home is a gourmet chef’s kitchen, designed to impress w/Argentinean marble floors, oversized center island, DCS 6-burner stove, double ovens, warming drawer, dual sinks, Sub-Zero refrigerator, wine fridge, fireplace & exceptional storage. The kitchen flows seamlessly into the dining room and onward to a step-down, expansive family room w/custom built-ins and cozy fireplace. Surrounding the family room is a bonus upper open area, ideal for bar or pool table- the perfect entertaining spot w/oversized glass sliders that frame serene views of the entertainer’s backyard—creating a seamless indoor-outdoor flow. Thoughtful floor plan features two private wings, creating an ideal layout for the five bedrooms and four baths. The primary retreat is a sanctuary of luxury, boasting a fireplace, custom up lighting, built-in wardrobes and fully finished walk-in closet. The spa-like primary bath features Carrera marble, heated floors, dual vanities, whirlpool soaking tub, oversized steam shower, and skylight that bathes the space in natural light. Two of the additional bedrooms are spacious en-suites, perfect for guests or family. A rare and impressive feature is the extra-large laundry room, designed to accommodate two washers and two dryers, with abundant cabinetry, a utility sink & direct access to yard. The resort-style backyard is an entertainer’s dream: an extended covered patio w/fireplace, Pebble Tec salt water pool w/slide, stylish spa-inspired outdoor shower, koi pond, putting green, low-maintenance turf, detached pool room & large gated/enclosed carport area. Additional highlights include mud room, finished three-car garage w/epoxy floors and built-in cabinets, solar, 3 A/C zones, CAT/cable wiring throughout. Homes like this are a rare find—offering custom design, privacy and luxury all in one. This extraordinary estate is truly one of a kind and won’t last!

column434: Welcome to this stunning, completely rebuilt/modernized estate in the prestigious Knollwood Country Club community. Boasting 5 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms, of luxurious living space, this home has been thoughtfully redesigned with no detail overlooked. Step inside to a bright open floor plan with floor-to-ceiling windows that fill the home with natural light. The heart of the home is the custom chef’s kitchen, featuring quartz countertops, an expanded island, and top-of-the-line luxury appliances including a Sub-Zero refrigerator, Wolf range cook-top, Wolf range double oven and Wolf range steam oven.Miele built-in coffee system, and custom made built in wine cooler. Perfect for entertaining, the kitchen flows seamlessly into the spacious living and dining areas, enhanced by oak wood luxury flooring and multiple fireplaces for warmth and sophistication. The residence offers two exceptional primary suites. One suite is a true private retreat, complete with its own additional bedroom/sitting area, making it ideal for multi-generational living, guest accommodations, or a private office. The spa-inspired bathroom features a freestanding soaking tub and a built-in sauna for the ultimate wellness experience. The second primary suite also delivers elegant comfort, giving the home extraordinary flexibility for family and guests. Every system has been modernized, including all-new plumbing, electrical, sewer lines, dual central A/C units, new gas lines, tankless water heater, and new windows, ensuring lasting comfort and efficiency. Outdoors, the resort-style backyard is designed for both relaxation and entertainment with a sparkling pool, spa, and golf course views. Enjoy direct access from your backyard to Knollwood Golf Course. The front yard has been beautifully reimagined with drought-friendly artificial grass, professional landscaping, and brand-new pavers in the circular driveway, offering both curb appeal and low-maintenance living. The property also features a 3-car garage and mature fruit trees (kumquat, lemon, fig) alongside iconic palms that complete the perfect California setting. This rare offering is more than a home—it’s a lifestyle. Whether hosting gatherings or enjoying quiet evenings, this estate delivers the perfect balance of elegance, functionality, and comfort.

column434: Welcome to this exceptional two-unit property where suburban tranquility meets incredible versatility and investment opportunity! This is more than a house; it's a strategically expanded and fully upgraded compound ready to accommodate a large family, multi-generational living, or a savvy buyer looking for significant rental income potential. The Main Residence: A Retreat Ready to Enjoy. Step inside this meticulously maintained main house, offering 3 good size bedrooms and 2.5 beautifully renovated baths. The ample master bedroom is a true sanctuary, featuring a spacious walk-in closet and a retreat-like master bath designed for unwinding after a long day. The home has been thoughtfully expanded and upgraded, boasting energy-efficient double-pane windows, elegant laminate flooring throughout, and a climate-controlled environment with central air and heat. This move-in ready space is polished and primed for immediate enjoyment. Complementing the main house is a private, newly constructed Accessory Dwelling Unit (ADU)—a major asset in today's Los Angeles market! Independent Living: This unit offers a full one-bedroom and one-bath layout, complete with its own kitchenette and comfortable living area. Maximum Flexibility: With an independent electric meter, the ADU is perfectly set up for long-term rental income, a private in-law suite, a guest house, or a dedicated home office. Location, Location, Location!  Nestled in the heart of Mission Hills, you'll benefit from a quiet, family-friendly atmosphere while enjoying unparalleled access to the best of the San Fernando Valley and beyond. Local Landmarks & History: Explore the rich heritage of the area with nearby attractions like the historic Mission San Fernando Rey de España and the Andrés Pico Adobe. Community Amenities: Enjoy convenient shopping, dining, and recreation with local favorites like Brand Park, new shopping plazas, diverse restaurants, and easy access to major retailers and grocery stores. Commuter's Dream: The property is centrally located near the major intersections of freeways, making commutes across Los Angeles effortless. Priced to Sell—this rare two-unit property combines modern updates, generous space, and a high-demand location. Whether you are looking for a great house for a large family, a perfect setup for two families living together, or an astute extra income potential and investment opportunity, this Mission Hills masterpiece is a must-see!

column434: Charming Tri-Level Townhouse in Valerio Village.  Ideal Starter Home or Investment Opportunity! Welcome to this beautifully designed 3-level townhouse located in the highly desirable Valerio Village Community. With 1,210 square feet of living space, this light-filled home features soaring ceilings and an open-concept layout that perfectly blends comfort and style.  The spacious living room is bathed in natural light thanks to dramatic high ceilings and glass sliding doors that open to a serene, Zen-inspired patio garden complete with fragrant orange blossoms in the spring and fresh fruit in the summer. A cozy gas fireplace and elevated dining loft make this space ideal for both relaxing and entertaining.  The kitchen includes a breakfast bar and a versatile pantry that currently doubles as an office or bonus bedroom. In-unit laundry adds everyday convenience.  Downstairs, the partially converted garage offers a dedicated music studio or creative workspace, perfect for artists or hobbyists. The home also features central HVAC, ensuring comfort throughout the seasons. Enjoy resort-style living with access to community amenities including a sparkling pool, soothing spas, a fully equipped recreation/gym room, and beautifully landscaped park-like grounds. Additional perks: Centrally located near shopping, dining, grocery stores, and easy access to the 170 Freeway.  HOA dues cover internet, earthquake insurance, water, trash, landscaping, and exterior maintenance.  Pet-friendly and people-friendly community. Don't miss this opportunity to own a unique and versatile home in one of the valley's most welcoming communities! Please DO NOT DISTURB or Contact Occupants.

column434: Location, Location, Location!  This Burbank adjacent home is on a quiet tree lined street and is completely gated so you can use the whole property.  The front gate is automatic, the hardscape, with updated cement driveway and concrete fencing with A double detached garage is located toward the back side of the property with it's own yard.  The open concept floor plan has a great indoor/outdoor vibe and this UPDATED gigantic kitchen is located in the best spot!  Easily accessed from the back yard for outdoor entertaining or hosting a family party inside with plenty of counter space for buffet.  The living room/dining room combination is freshly painted with recessed lights and crown molding offering an updated space with room for your own touches.  The onsuite master bedroom is enormous with sliding glass door to the private back yard.  The master bathroom is updated with sizable glass shower, dual vanity and plenty of storage.  The other two bedrooms are located down the hallway and are comfortably sized, one is about 10' x 10' and the other is about 8' x 11'.  These bedrooms are close to the generously sized hallway bathroom with dual sink vanity.  The back yard was recently re-seeded and looks lush with fruit trees and room for so much fun. Upgraded electrical panel, updated roof and HVAC, updated copper plumbing about 10 years ago.   Don't miss out on this really great floorplan and location!

column434: A hidden gem, located in North Hollywood, is hitting the market after decades of cherished ownership. This lovely 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom home with an additional office boasts a generous layout, versatile design, and character.  You’re greeted by a large front driveway with ample parking and enchanting landscaped curb appeal. The living and dining areas are perfect for relaxing evenings or lively gatherings with family and friends. The home office offers flexibility, which can serve as a creative space or a playroom for children.  The expansive backyard is your own private retreat with mature greenery, a charming pergola that adds both shade and ambiance, and two multifunctional bonus rooms — perfect for a home gym, art studio, or whatever your heart desires. A dedicated laundry room adds convenience, keeping the home’s main living areas open and uncluttered. The detached two-car garage provides generous storage, complemented by an additional storage area and a secondary long driveway with private rear access. This move-in-ready property, along with its generous lot size, presents incredible ADU potential. A few photos have been enhanced with virtual staging, and a wall color change was added to one of the bedrooms. Whether you're looking to expand, invest, or simply live with more space and comfort, this home demonstrates endless possibilities for growth and transformation.

column434: Welcome Home! This charming single-story home in North Hollywood offers comfort, style, and convenience. Featuring 4 bedrooms, 2 upgraded bathrooms, a formal living and dining area, a cozy nook, and a 2-car garage, this residence is designed for both everyday living and entertaining. The gated front yard with a wrought iron entry adds both privacy and curb appeal. Step through the upgraded wood front door and into a private courtyard that sets a warm and inviting tone. Inside, you’ll find natural wood flooring throughout, bringing warmth and character to every room. The kitchen is equipped with granite tile countertops and stainless steel appliances, and opens to a bright nook area with French doors leading to a non permitted versatile room (approx. 132 sq. ft.) that opens up to endless possibilities — greenhouse or plant room, reading lounge, workout or yoga room, art or craft studio, or play room to name a few! All bedrooms include mirrored wardrobe doors, and the bathrooms have been tastefully updated with tiled showers and granite countertop, one bedroom also offers direct French door access to the backyard, where you'll find a covered patio and spacious yard, ideal for gatherings with family and friends. Additional highlights include, newer roof (installed 2023), central heating and air conditioning, new water heater (installed 2024), low property taxes, and No HOA. Centrally located with easy access to the 170, 101, and 134 freeways, this home offers an ideal location for commuters and anyone wanting to be close to everything Los Angeles has to offer. This beautifully maintained home is move-in ready—don’t miss out! Call today to schedule a showing! (Click the 360 for video tour)

column434: Step into your dream home 11324 W Raitt Lane, a modern and luxurious 2021 built residence in the heart of North Hollywood. This thoughtfully designed four story 3-bedroom, 4-bathroom home offers 1,847 square feet of living space with an oversized LOFT, perfectly crafted for comfort, style, and convenience. Boasting four levels of contemporary architecture, this property delivers a unique blend of sophistication and smart-home innovation. As you step inside, you’re greeted by a spacious and airy interior that seamlessly blends form and function. The home features a large loft, offering endless possibilities to create a dedicated office, playroom, or entertainment lounge. The high ceilings and open floor plan ensure a smooth flow between living spaces, while high-quality finishes and fixtures elevate the overall ambiance. The stunning open floor plan kitchen features exquisite countertops and a spacious island perfect for culinary adventures. Designed for the tech-savvy homeowner, this residence is outfitted with an in-ceiling built-in Sonos sound system, providing premium audio for your favorite music, podcasts, or movies in every corner of the home. The Brilliant Home Smart System offers intuitive control over lighting, music, and other smart devices, while the Ring Alarm Smart Home Package with a Schlage Encode Door Lock ensures your peace of mind with advanced security features. Adding to the convenience, the Lutron Smart Home Package allows for effortless management of lighting and shades, further enhancing the home’s modern functionality. The two outdoor spaces are equally impressive. Take the floating stairs to the private balcony off the loft, where you're invited to unwind and soak in the beautiful views of the city and the mountains, whether you’re enjoying your morning coffee or relaxing in the evening. With ample natural light streaming in and thoughtfully designed indoor and outdoor living areas, this home is a true sanctuary in the city. Situated in a prime North Hollywood location, 11324 W Raitt Lane is close to vibrant dining, entertainment, and shopping destinations. This home is the epitome of luxury living, offering a perfect blend of cutting-edge technology, architectural elegance, and urban convenience. Located conveniently close to Noho Arts District and Noho West! Experience modern living at its finest—schedule your private tour today!

column434: This stunning home is located in the heart of vibrant North Hollywood in proximity to major freeways, NoHo, Studio City, Burbank Studios, and the Westside in a GATED COMMUNITY with only 12 homes. It's one of only two built within the community with a FULL TWO-CAR DRIVEWAY, which is a huge bonus, and has one of the largest backyards. Enter into a massive OPEN FLOOR PLAN with large windows that let in tons of light. Your KITCHEN is a smooth transition open to the dining area with views to the backyard and living room, and is updated with NEWER STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES, including a high-end Bosch dishwasher. UPSTAIRS is just as spacious with THREE LARGE BEDROOMS, a PRIMARY ON-SUITE with a WALK-IN CLOSET, DUAL VANITY, NEWER SHOWER DOOR, and BUILT-IN STORAGE. The laundry room is also equipped with EXTRA CUSTOM BUILT-IN STORAGE, HANGING RACK, and a small FOLDOUT TABLE. The backyard has been completely revamped with gravel, a PERGOLA, string lights, a FOUNTAIN, and is enhanced with Wi-Fi-controlled lights perfect for outdoor dining. OTHER UPDATES and features include some SMART HOME DIMMERS, SWITCHES, RING ALARM SECURITY SYSTEM, TANKLESS WATER HEATER, and last but not least, MATURE FRUIT TREES include lemon, mandarin, avocado, and pomegranate. The perfect place to call home. (Assessor shows 1781 SF, Appraisal shows 1795)

column434: Located on a serene and idyllic street, in the highly desirable city of North Hollywood and exuding pride of ownership and custom touches throughout, this is the home for the most discerning of buyers. Spanning almost 1900 sq. ft of living space, spread out over two levels, you’ll enjoy comfort, quality and design touches the moment you turn the knob and enter your new home. From the quaint living room, to the custom kitchen, formal dining room and large family room with a wood burning fireplace, you’ll have plenty of space for those family gatherings. With two bedrooms,  home office and bathroom downstairs, a private master retreat, complete with an oversized bedroom and en-suite bathroom on the second level, you’ll have the space and privacy a large family cherishes. To add to what’s already plentiful, a wet bar, surround sound, skylights, custom lighting, dual paned windows, electric gate, an oversized two car detached garage with a workshop and a backyard complete with fruit trees that are waiting for your personalized touches round out the specialness that this home evokes. Welcome to the endless possibilities of life in charming North Hollywood.

column434: Step inside and instantly feel at home. Sunlight cascades through soaring 12-foot ceilings, while custom UV-blocking shades allow you to control the brightness and temp. A spacious kitchen with upgraded appliances blend into an open living area allowing for special times and memorable conversations. With a bedroom and bathroom downstairs, you'll be ready for visitors and/or additional family anytime. Upstairs you'll find 3 spacious, bedrooms with the primary suite offering a private balcony for morning coffee, a walk-in and an additional custom-built closet, his-and-hers sinks, and a large, relaxing soaking tub. Out back, your private finished patio sets the stage for barbecues, quiet lounging, or lively get-togethers. Ring security cameras offer peace of mind, while the paid-off Tesla Solar system keeps your energy costs delightfully low. A true two-car garage, added storage, and the EV-ready outlet complete the package. Tucked at the end of a quiet Way, this home is one of the most private in the community -no neighbors looking in, minimal outside noise, guest parking right out front, and a peaceful grassy sitting area that feels all your own. You'll enjoy all the vibes and convenience of NOHO including quick and easy access to all the lifestyle, entertainment, and dining experiences of NOHO West!

column434: Located in North Hollywood West, one of the area's most coveted neighborhoods, this charming 1950s Ranch-style home represents a beloved chapter in Los Angeles architectural history. This house offers a flexible floor plan, is move-in ready, and holds the upside potential for future customization at your leisure. The flexible floor plan offers the unique option to create a Junior Accessory Dwelling Unit (JADU). The garage was converted into a primary bedroom with an en-suite bathroom in 1986 (with permits). Converting this existing space into a JADU may be more feasible and less costly than a standard ADU garage conversion, allowing you to live in one and rent the other. Currently, this bedroom has a separate entrance and is closed off from the main house, but it can easily be reconnected to create an expansive primary suite. Beyond the flexible floor plan, the house has received several significant upgrades, including a recently replaced energy-efficient cool roof, new solar panels, central air conditioning, a refurbished kitchen, and new exterior siding and paint. New landscaping was also installed. $90,000 in energy-efficient upgrades were done in 2018 through the Property Assessed Clean Energy (PACE) program (solar panels, roof, and electrical panel); the seller will pay these. With good bones and its versatile layout, this property offers a unique opportunity: get into an aesthetically pleasing house in a desirable neighborhood at a reasonable price, without the heavy premium of a fully remodeled flip. Make this your home and catch the early wave of the growing appreciation for the Mid-Century Ranch style.

column434: Versatile 3-Bedroom, 3-Bathroom Home with Private ADU in North Hollywood: Welcome to 7809 Troost Avenue — a unique opportunity in the heart of North Hollywood. This 2,240 sq ft home, built in 1924, offers solid bones and incredible potential for personalization. With a full 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom layout that includes a private ADU, it’s ideal for homeowners, investors, or multi-generational living. Main Home Features: 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms in the main house Functional layout with opportunity to update the kitchen and living areas to suit your style The interior offers a blank slate for your design vision Detached ADU (Accessory Dwelling Unit): 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom with a full kitchen Separate entrance offers flexibility for rental income, guests, or home office use Lot & Exterior: 5,458 sq ft lot that is fully paved — no grass yard, but low maintenance and great for extra parking or creative outdoor use Dual driveway access from both the front and back of the property Mature trees provide shade and character to the outdoor space Zoned R2, with potential for future development or expansion Neighborhood Highlights: Located in a fast-evolving North Hollywood neighborhood. Close to shopping, dining, schools, and public transit. Easy access to major freeways for commuting. Whether you're looking to live in one unit and rent the other, invest, or fully transform this space into something special, 7809 Troost Avenue is packed with potential in an up-and-coming part of the Valley.

You’ll step into a flowing 2,084 square foot open-concept floor plan that is in “Move-In Condition” with recessed lighting and a combination of durable tile and hardwood flooring. The spacious living room has a wood-beamed ceiling and a gas-burning fireplace. A large entertainer's family room with floor-to-ceiling gas-burning stone fireplace and direct pool access flows seamlessly into the living room. The family's cook will truly appreciate the kitchen's recessed lighting, abundant cabinets, ample file counters with backsplash, gas cooktop, built-in appliances, and the convenience of the adjoining dining area. 5 bedrooms: The grand suite has a walk-in closet and private bathroom. All of this is nestled on a large 6,251 square foot corner lot that's grocery stores, restaurants, shopping, and the 170 freeway. Call now for all the details and I'll gladly arrange a private tour. Its sell in "As is conditions". SELLER MOTIVATED.

column434: Welcome to this well appointed and truly turnkey 4 bedroom, 5 bathroom home located just minutes from the vibrant NOHO West. Blending comfort, space and outdoor luxury, this home offers a rare opportunity in one of the Valley's most convenient neighborhoods. The main level opens with a formal foyer and leads to two generously sized bedrooms, both featuring private en-suite bathrooms ideal for guests or extended family. A third guest bathroom is located just off the kitchen, providing easy access while entertaining. The home features a separate fully upgraded kitchen with modern cabinetry and stainless steel appliances. Enjoy everyday living and entertaining in the expansive open concept layout that seamlessly connects a large living room and the dining area. A den with a fireplace offers a relaxing spot for everyday use or entertaining. Downstairs, a rare finished basement adds valuable bonus space, ideal for a home gym, media room, storage, etc. The main level third bedroom currently configured as kids room and bedroom side by side offering a flexible setup that can be easily converted back to a single bedroom with a walking closet. Upstairs, the private primary suite serves as a peaceful retreat, featuring a walk-in closet, spa-style bath with jacuzzi tub, glass shower and abundant natural light. Step into the backyard and discover a true entertainer's paradise: a covered patio with ceiling fan, built-in BBQ island, bar with sink, heated pool with swim jet, and a cascading jacuzzi spa. The layout offers plenty of space for lounging, dining and enjoying Southern California's indoor-outdoor lifestyle. Additional features include an attached garage, 30 paid off solar panels, multi-zone HVAC, two tankless water heaters and a security camera system. Located near studios, the NoHo Arts District, shops, dining and major freeways, this turnkey home delivers flexibility, character and resort-style living in the heart of North Hollywood.

column434: Exceptional opportunity to acquire a fully upgraded 4-bedroom, 1.5 bath single-family home operating as an assisted living facility (RCFE). With over $100,000 in recent improvements, this property is thoughtfully designed to meet boarding care standards and is ideal for housing up to 6 residents. Recent upgrades include fresh interior and exterior paint, new flooring throughout, brand-new fully equipped kitchen with modern cabinetry, quartz counter tops, and stainless steal appliances, a newer HVAC system, and a newer roof — offering peace of mind and minimal capital expenses for years to come. Each bedroom has been customized with resident comfort and compliance in mind, and the property comes partially furnished to comply with assisted living requirements—making it a truly turnkey solution for care providers. The home features multiple accessibility enhancements, including wheelchair ramps throughout, grab bar in the full bath. The spacious, gated front yard boasts beautiful landscaping, while the large backyard includes alley access — perfect for ambulance entry and emergency services.Whether you're an experienced operator or looking to enter the growing senior care market, this property is a ready-to-go solution in a high-demand sector.

column434: Located in North Hollywood, this wonderful property offers a main house and an ADU, totaling 6 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, and 2,832 sq ft of living space. The main house features 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, and 1,632 sq ft of charm. Upon entry, you're greeted by a bright and inviting living room with a beamed ceiling, a cozy stone fireplace, and large windows offering views of the pool. The backyard provides a private oasis with a lush green lawn and a covered patio—perfect for outdoor entertaining. The stylish kitchen is a chef's delight, featuring a stunning backsplash, white granite laminate countertops, stainless steel appliances, and ample storage. Two of the bathrooms include walk-in showers, while the spacious and well-lit bedrooms offer plenty of closet space. The primary bedroom features an ensuite bathroom for added privacy and convenience. A laundry area with additional storage completes the main house. The ADU adds an additional 1,200 sq ft, offering 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. It includes a charming front patio, a private above-ground spa, and a sauna accessible from one of the bedrooms. Inside, the open floorplan boasts laminate flooring, recessed lighting, and a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances. There's also a convenient laundry area with a stackable washer and dryer. With parking for up to 6 cars, this property is perfectly situated in a great North Hollywood location, offering convenience and comfort for a large family or as an investment opportunity.
