Surrounded by palm trees, the covered patio & BBQ area overlooking the glistening pool, spa & firepit makes this an ideal, private setting for gatherings day or night. Additional highlights include a spacious garage w/ ample storage space to accommodate any buyers’ needs while the circular driveway can support parking for large families. Don’t miss this one-of-a-kind home blending sophistication, comfort, and unforgettable entertaining spaces.

column434: Welcome to this spacious and well-maintained three-bedroom, two-bathroom condo located in a secure gated community in the heart of North Hills. The home features an open and bright living room with high ceilings, a cozy fireplace, and direct access to a private deck, creating the perfect setting for relaxing or entertaining. The functional layout offers plenty of natural light throughout, enhancing the warm and inviting atmosphere. The kitchen comes fully equipped with a microwave, refrigerator, and ample cabinetry for storage. Tile flooring flows seamlessly throughout the home, providing easy maintenance and durability. A stacked washer and dryer are conveniently included inside the unit. The property also features central air conditioning and heating, attic access for additional storage, and a thoughtfully designed floor plan that maximizes comfort and functionality. Two assigned covered carport parking spaces are located within a gated parking area for added security and convenience. Residents of this community enjoy access to a sparkling swimming pool, relaxing jacuzzi, and well-maintained landscaped common areas managed by the homeowners association. This property offers an excellent location with easy access to major freeways, shopping centers, restaurants, schools, and public transportation. Whether you are a first-time homebuyer, looking to downsize, or searching for an investment property, this condo provides the perfect combination of comfort, practicality, and accessibility in one desirable package.

Once arrived at drive in gate located on Haskell Ave. (1) press circular button with Capital A on it [keypad-Intercom is to the right of {next to} the drive in gate], then (2) Dial 802; If it goes to voicemail, try back 30-60 seconds later. When a person answers tell them you are calling to gain access to the Nordell Park Townhouse Community Unit #36 (3) The front door of unit #36 is inside the black rod-iron fence and the lockbox is on the front door which faces Nordhoff Street (4) Key designations are as follows: (a) the smallest key is for Mailbox #36. (b) the two similar length [slightly longer than the Mail key] keys are for the front door locks – one for the upper deadbolt and the other for the lower deadbolt as well as the door handle [if it is locked] (c) the longest silver keys are for Community access {i.e. walk in gates around the black metal rod iron fence; pool area [which is currently in accessible.], etc.} (d) the gold/brown key is for the sliding glass door from the garage/patio area into the living room [next to the fireplace]. Thanks for showing and thanks for making sure that the garage door is closed and the front door and sliding glass door are locked before you leave. (the person programmed to grant you access through the drive in gate is in another state, so as much advanced notice as possible as well as being as punctual as possible will be a great help.) Thanks in advance for showing.

column434: Welcome Home! This pride-of-ownership, free-standing two-story condo offers 1,896 sq. ft. of living space with 4 bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms, featuring numerous upgrades throughout. The flexible 4th bedroom (currently used as a formal dining room) is conveniently located on the main level with a full bathroom nearby—perfect for a multi-generational household or guest space. The living room boasts vaulted ceilings and arched windows framing a cozy fireplace. A custom kitchen provides ample storage, granite counters, high-end stainless steel appliances, and a charming garden window overlooking the private yard. The main level also includes side-by-side laundry and direct access to the backyard. A sliding glass door leads to the private enclosed yard, where you’ll find a covered gazebo with a fire pit table for six, mature avocado, fruit, and citrus trees, and striking flowering cactus for year-round beauty. Upstairs, the spacious primary suite features soaring ceilings, abundant natural light, a sitting area with fireplace, and a luxurious en-suite bathroom with jetted tub, separate shower, double sinks, and a large walk-in closet. Two additional bedrooms—one with vaulted ceilings and the other with a charming built-in window seat—3rd full bath completes the upper level. Additional highlights include: Newer carpet, flooring, and paint, Full security alarm system plus exterior & interior Ring cameras Epoxy-finished garage with insulated door, automatic opener, and storage (freezer included). Gated community with controlled entry. Lovingly cared for and on the market for the first time in 25 years—this home is truly move-in ready!

column434: WOW! Right on time to celebrate the holiday season in your new home. Discover this spacious and thoughtfully designed North Hills home with four bedrooms and three baths, in addition, the rare convenience of a main-floor bedroom/bonus room and bath—perfect for guests, multi-generational living, or a private office retreat. Ideally situated on a desirable corner lot with yard space on three sides, the property offers added privacy, mature fruit trees, and multiple outdoor areas for entertaining, complete with covered patios, awnings, and an above-ground spa, as well as a seamless flow from the dining area to the backyard for convenient entertaining. Inside, soaring two-story ceilings frame a dramatic living room anchored by a cozy fireplace, while the updated kitchen boasts newer cabinetry, countertops, backsplash, a breakfast bar, and a charming garden bay window above the sink. Upstairs, the oversized primary suite provides a seating area, private balcony retreat, walk-in closet, and spa-inspired en-suite with double sinks, soaking tub, and separate shower, complemented by three additional bedrooms—two with access to a shared balcony—and a beautifully finished full guest bath. The attached two-car garage enhances everyday living with an overhead storage lift, large utility alcove, butler’s sink, full-size washer and dryer, spare refrigerator, and abundant storage space, while modern touches like a Nest system add comfort and efficiency. Wonderfully located near shopping, dining, parks, the 405 freeway, and right next to an elementary school. This home offers the perfect blend of practicality, privacy, and timeless comfort. Don’t let this one pass you by!

column434: BACK ON THE MARKET with a SENSATIONAL PRICE REDUCTION!  Welcome to an unparalleled opportunity in the heart of North Hills, CA! This fully remodeled, turn-key single-family home at 15814 Septo St offers the ultimate California lifestyle combined with exceptional income potential or flexible multi-generational living. Spanning a spacious 1,394 sq ft, the main residence boasts 3 bedrooms and 2 baths, exuding modern elegance from the moment you step inside. A charming entry unfolds into an open-concept living, dining, and gourmet kitchen area, perfect for entertaining. Experience the brilliance of beautiful LED lighting and abundant natural light streaming through large, new dual-pane windows. The chef's dream kitchen features brand-new stainless steel appliances, soft-closing custom cabinetry, and exquisite Quartz countertops. Both bathrooms are spa-like retreats with contemporary fixtures and spacious walk-in showers, all brilliantly lit. Step outside to your private backyard oasis, where a stunning heated pool awaits for year-round enjoyment and relaxation – ideal for family fun or unwinding after a long day. But that's not all! This remarkable property includes a permitted 484 sq ft Accessory Dwelling Unit (ADU) with 1 bedroom and 1 bath, offering incredible versatility as a guest house, rental income property, or dedicated home office. No detail has been overlooked in this extensive renovation! Both the main home and ADU feature a new roof, new windows, new doors, updated electrical wiring and panels, and new plumbing, ensuring peace of mind for years to come. For added convenience and potential savings, both units are separately metered for electricity and equipped with new Rinnai tankless water heaters. Modern living is further enhanced with a dedicated 220V/50 Amp EV charging outlet in the front driveway, ready for your electric vehicle. The main home offers central HVAC for ultimate comfort, while the ADU provides efficient cooling with two mini-split air conditioning units. Both homes also have provision for laundry in the kitchen area. URGENT OPPORTUNITY! Given North Hills' competitive market, this property won't last long. Act quickly to secure this extraordinary gem! Don't miss your chance to own a truly turn-key, value-packed property in a desirable North Hills location.

column434: Step into a lifestyle designed for comfort, convenience, and modern-day ease in this beautifully reimagined Spacious 4-bedroom, 2-bath home in the heart of North Hills. Be the first to enjoy a space that not only looks stunning—but also supports the rhythm of everyday life. From the moment you walk in, natural light welcomes you into an open, flowing layout ideal for both quiet mornings and lively gatherings. The custom-designed kitchen is a true hub of the home—outfitted with high-end, smart Café appliances, including a tech-enabled 6-burner range, built-in microwave drawer, and a pot filler to save steps when cooking. Whether you're prepping dinner or brewing coffee, every detail is designed to make life easier. Retreat to one of four spacious bedrooms, each designed for rest and renewal. Both bathrooms have been completely transformed, offering spa-like serenity with heated towel racks, Bluetooth smart vents, and mirrors that integrate light and sound — creating a luxurious, hotel-quality experience every day. Comfort meets peace of mind with upgraded electrical, brand-new HVAC, energy-efficient attic insulation, and whole-home smart features—like a Nest thermostat, EV charger, Ring security system, and keyless entry—giving you control and security, even on the go. Outside, your professionally designed, low-maintenance backyard with artificial turf and ambient lighting becomes your own private oasis—perfect for relaxing, entertaining, or simply enjoying California’s beautiful weather year-round. Set on a quiet, tree-lined street close to parks, schools, shopping, dining, and major freeways, this move-in-ready home offers the best of modern convenience and neighborhood charm. This isn’t just a remodel — it’s a rebirth. Be the first to write your story here at 9233 Swinton Avenue, where every finish, fixture, and feature has been crafted for the way you want to live today.

column434: Welcome to 16900 Mayall Street, a beautifully upgraded and spacious residence located in the highly desirable neighborhood of North Hills. This impressive home offers 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, and a generous 2,770 square feet of living space, providing the perfect blend of comfort, style, and functionality for modern living. From the moment you step inside, you’ll be captivated by the home’s warm and inviting atmosphere, enhanced by elegant recessed lighting and an open, flowing floor plan. The heart of the home is the fully redone kitchen, thoughtfully designed with today’s homeowner in mind. It features sleek countertops, custom cabinetry, modern appliances, and ample prep space, making it an ideal setting for everything from quiet morning coffee to lively dinner parties. Each of the four bedrooms (3 bedrooms downstairs, 1 upstairs) offers comfort and privacy, including a spacious primary suite with an en-suite bathroom. The additional bathrooms are tastefully updated and designed to accommodate both family and guests with ease. The expansive living areas include a large family room and a formal dining space, perfect for entertaining or simply enjoying a quiet evening at home. Throughout the home, attention to detail is evident—from the updated lighting fixtures to the thoughtful layout that maximizes natural light and enhances livability. Whether you're looking to host friends, work from home, or relax with family, this home offers versatile spaces to suit every need. Situated on a peaceful street in North Hills, this home also offers convenient access to local schools, parks, shopping centers, and major freeways, making your daily commute and weekend outings a breeze. With its spacious interior, stylish upgrades, and prime location, 16900 Mayall Street is more than just a house—it's a place to call home.

column434: This beautifully renovated home seamlessly combines modern upgrades with timeless elegance, offering exceptional comfort and style throughout. The fully remodeled kitchen features modern cabinets, sleek countertops, and premium appliances—all included. Both bathrooms have been tastefully updated with designer tile and luxury fixtures, while stylish oak hardwood floors—one of today’s most sought-after finishes—extend seamlessly throughout the main home and the ADU, enhancing every space with warmth and sophistication. Major system upgrades include a brand-new plumbing system, improved drain lines, and a fully insulated garage with EV charger for enhanced efficiency. The permitted and fully remodeled ADU adds incredible versatility—perfect for generating rental income, hosting extended family, or creating a private home office. There is also a convenient laundry connection in the main home, along with a separate laundry connection dedicated to the ADU for added independence and flexibility. Plus, fully paid-off solar panels deliver long-term energy savings and sustainability, making this home as smart as it is beautiful. All renovations, including the ADU, were completed with proper permits, ensuring quality craftsmanship and peace of mind for the next owner. This move-in ready home truly stands out—don’t miss this exceptional opportunity!

column434: REMODELED HOME ON EXPANSIVE LOT WITH AGRICULTURAL ZONING & ENDLESS POTENTIAL! Step into this beautifully remodeled residence, set on a sprawling 31,619 sq ft FLAT lot in a highly desirable LA Residential Agriculture zone. Originally built in 1938, this charming home has been completely transformed- inside and out- with fresh paint, new flooring, updated windows , all new bathroom fixtures  floors and lighting. Professionally designed landscaping in both the front and the back including garden beds.  Offering approximately 2056 sq ft of living space, the home features 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.  One of the standout upgrades is the converted attached garage and breezeway, now is a spacious primary suite with its own bathroom and walk-in closet. While title reflects a 2 bedroom, 1-bath layout, the enhancements provide a expanded comfort and functionality.  The open spacious living area reminds one of a chalet which includes fireplace. Kitchen includes all new stainless steel appliances, counter tops, cabinets, lighting all new flooring throughout the house.   Outside, the property continues to impress with a detached 3-car garage and a sectional metal storage container-perfect for tools, equipment, or hobby space. Fruit trees dot the landscape, adding charm and utility to the grounds. Zoned for Residential agriculture, this property is ideal for a small farm, nursery, or dog kennel. Horses and goats are permitted.  The vast, flat terrain also offers favorable possibilities for adding ADU's or additional units, making it a rare opportunity for homeowners and investors alike. Well located in the city of center of the San Fernando Valley North Hills community.  The location offers city close commute to the civic center, Pasadena, West los Angeles, beach, Ventura, and most areas of Los Angeles.

column434: Location and Opportunity! Rare opportunity to own a nearly 1 acre flat lot with tremendous development potential. Parcel map application has already been prepared to divide the lot into 4 lots of approx. 10,000 sq ft each, with tentative plans for a large main house, an ADU and Junior ADU on each lot. All to be connected by a private street. Resulting property can consist of 4 lots with 12 dwellings which can be sold as 4 parcels or rented as 12 dwellings. Project was preliminarily approved by LA City building and safety. Next step is to submit the plans and pay the fees. Alternatively you may modify the plans and build your dream house or try to obtain approval for a higher density development with more units. There are no oak trees on the lot. Seller makes no representations as to what the city will approve. Currently the permitted building is about 800 sq ft and has a 400 sq ft add-on.

column434: Builders special with the additional possibility of multifamily development. Check out SB 79 and the North San Fernando Valley Transit Corridor BRT Network Enhancement Project and how it impacts the property. Secure gated horse property. Boasting rare street-to-street access from Nordhoff or Sunburst, the property is ideally positioned adjacent to the 4 story West Valley Library and steps away from public transportation, making it a commuter’s dream. With zoning that permits horses and potential to add multiple ADUs (buyer to verify), this property is a blank canvas for a creative visionary. For savvy developers, the lot's potential is even more enticing: split the parcel into 4-5 individual lots, or possibly take advantage of state bills prioritizing affordable housing to build multiple units. This property ticks all the boxes for those looking to capitalize on the push for affordable housing in the area—though buyers are encouraged to perform due diligence on obtaining the necessary approvals for new construction. Whether you're imagining a dream home oasis, a lucrative multi-unit investment, or exploring the possibilities for building affordable apartments, 16326 Nordhoff St. offers an exceptional opportunity in a high-demand area. Act quickly—opportunities like this don’t last long! The house is approx 2,100 SF, 3 BR 2 BA, with beamed ceiling & sunlights, enclosed patio with office space and laundry, fireplaces in LR and primary BR, an enclosed gym, and a 15x30 pool. There’s a permitted guest house, equestrian keeping area and exercise ring, and tons of space for storage. Front U driveway with two entrances, easy in an out with trailers / eqpt and/or ample off street guest parking. Inside the gate down the driveway is a 3 car carport. Workshop area with plenty of space for tools / storage. The Horse paddock is fenced, has 3 small stall shelters, one with turnout. 25x80 exercise round pen in back, a two-story accessory building off of the pool with a deck and power; great for a kids playhouse / game room / pool house / art studio. Permitted guest house is ~800 SF, with sunny full kitchen and full bath which has a private entrance off Sunburst.  Property has access from two streets: Nordhoff & Sunburst. Located in a transit rich corridor on a major street.   Close proximity to shopping, restaurants, fast food, public transportation, business centers & CSUN. List price is for land value only. Property being sold in an as-is condition. Call for details.

column434: Welcome to this spacious and well-appointed single level 2 beds/2 baths condo, offering a serene retreat within a vibrant community. As you step through the formal entrance, you're greeted by a light-filled living space, adorned with large windows and a large balcony that runs the length of the unit. The heart of this home is the spacious eat-in kitchen, boasting granite countertops and plenty of storage. Two generously sized primary bedrooms, each with its own en-suite, are located on opposite sides of the unit for maximum privacy, offer ample accommodation and convenience. In each primary bedroom, you'll discover not one, but two closets, including a generously sized walk-in closet, providing plenty of storage space. Recent UPGRADES include fresh paint throughout the unit, new heating pump, new refrigerator and garbage disposal, as well as new vanities, quartz countertops, sinks, and faucets in both bathrooms. For added convenience, this condo comes with access to resort-like amenities, including a pool, spa, and sun deck, perfect for leisurely afternoons in the sun. Stay active in the well-equipped gym, offering panoramic views of the pool area. Relax in a sauna. Additional features include two side-by-side parking spots in the secured underground garage, large storage room, gated access to the community and code access to the building. Welcome home!

column434: Welcome to resort-style living in the desirable Regents Court, a gated community in a prime Northridge location. This stunning 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo offers a bright and open floor plan spanning 1,365 square feet. The spacious main living area is defined by beautiful hardwood flooring and a striking center dual-sided fireplace that elegantly separates the living room from the dining area. The large kitchen is a chef's delight, featuring granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, durable tile flooring, skylight, a convenient breakfast bar, and ample space that could easily accommodate a breakfast table, center island or additional cabinets.This exceptional home features a dual master layout, perfect for roommates or guests. The primary master bedroom is a true retreat with a large walk-in closet and an en-suite bathroom complete with a spacious dual vanity. The secondary bedroom is also generously sized and boasts its own large walk-in closet. Both bathrooms are finished with granite counters. Enjoy seamless indoor-outdoor living on the awesome and spacious private balcony, accessible from both the living and dining rooms. Additional conveniences include an in-unit laundry closet, newer heating and air conditioning, and a secure, privately locked storage room on the same floor for invaluable extra storage.Life at Regents Court includes access to fantastic community amenities, including a sparkling pool and spa, a fitness center, and a sauna. An elevator for easy access to the third floor. This home is perfectly situated in a central Northridge location, just moments from CSUN, popular restaurants, shopping, and more.

column434: Location! Location! Location! Welcome to this beautifully maintained two-story home located in the highly sought-after gated Peppertree community of Northridge. This residence offers a blend of comfort, convenience, and community living. Inside, you’ll find a spacious living room with serene views of the greenbelts, kitchen with ample cabinetry and views into the private patio—perfect for indoor-outdoor living. The first floor also features a dining room with a sliding glass door to the patio area and a convenient guest bathroom with a laundry area on the main level. Upstairs, the primary suite boasts a private balcony, an en suite bathroom with walk-in shower and vanity, and generous closet space. Two additional bedrooms and a full hall bathroom with a large vanity and shower-tub combo complete the second level. Additional highlights include ceiling fans throughout for added comfort. Residents of Peppertree enjoy fantastic HOA amenities including 2 assigned parking spaces (one covered parking space with storage cabinet), secure gated entry, a sparkling pool, additional kid pool, tennis courts, spacious greenbelts, and included water and trash utilities. Ideally situated near shopping at the Galleria Market, parks, dining, CSUN, Northridge Little League, Smart & Final and easy freeway access, this home offers both convenience and a welcoming community atmosphere. Don’t miss the opportunity to make this beautiful property your new home!

column533: Location! Location! Location! Welcome to this beautifully maintained two-story home located in the highly sought-after gated Peppertree community of Northridge. This residence offers a blend of comfort, convenience, and community living. Inside, you’ll find a spacious living room with serene views of the greenbelts, kitchen with ample cabinetry and views into the private patio—perfect for indoor-outdoor living. The first floor also features a dining room with a sliding glass door to the patio area and a convenient guest bathroom with a laundry area on the main level. Upstairs, the primary suite boasts a private balcony, an en suite bathroom with walk-in shower and vanity, and generous closet space. Two additional bedrooms and a full hall bathroom with a large vanity and shower-tub combo complete the second level. Additional highlights include ceiling fans throughout for added comfort. Residents of Peppertree enjoy fantastic HOA amenities including 2 assigned parking spaces (one covered parking space with storage cabinet), secure gated entry, a sparkling pool, additional kid pool, tennis courts, spacious greenbelts, and included water and trash utilities. Ideally situated near shopping at the Galleria Market, parks, dining, CSUN, Northridge Little League, Smart & Final and easy freeway access, this home offers both convenience and a welcoming community atmosphere. Don’t miss the opportunity to make this beautiful property your new home! Residents of Peppertree enjoy fantastic HOA amenities including 2 assigned parking spaces (one covered parking space with storage cabinet), secure gated entry, a sparkling pool, additional kid pool, tennis courts, spacious greenbelts, and included water and trash utilities. Ideally situated near shopping, dining, CSUN, Northridge Little League, and easy freeway access, this home offers both convenience and a welcoming community atmosphere. Don’t miss the opportunity to make this beautiful property your new home!

column434: Beautiful Move-In Ready Townhome in Devonshire Village. Step into comfort and style with this beautifully updated 2-bedroom, 2.5-bath townhome nestled in the sought-after Devonshire Village community. The inviting living room welcomes you with abundant natural light, an elegant fireplace, and a seamless flow into the dining area, perfect for entertaining. Enjoy the convenience of a wet bar and a gourmet kitchen featuring a cozy breakfast nook, granite countertops, and ample cabinet space. Upstairs, you’ll find two spacious primary suites, each offering a private bath and walk-in closet for ultimate comfort and privacy. A guest powder room is conveniently located on the main level. Step outside to a private patio, perfect for BBQs, morning coffee, or relaxed gatherings. additional highlights include in-unit laundry and a direct-access two-car garage. Devonshire Village offers resort-style amenities with two sparkling pools, a soothing spa, and lush, manicured grounds. HOA dues include water, cable, internet, exterior maintenance, and earthquake insurance, making for worry-free living. Perfectly located just minutes from CSUN, popular shopping and dining destinations, freeway access, and the award-winning Granada Hills Charter High School. This charming Northridge home blends modern convenience with a welcoming community atmosphere, truly a place to call home.

column434: Northridge Townhome Estates is a beautifully designed and pristinely maintained community in the north Valley. This move-in ready spacious two bedroom model is conveniently located within the complex near the recreation room, gym and main pool, (heated year round).  ***  This townhome has natural slate tile flooring throughout first level. Large main living room with vaulted ceiling, fireplace and floor to ceiling windows. Adjoining dining area with views of rear yard landscaping.  ***  Updated galley kitchen with new quality stainless appliances, included double door refrigerator and substantial cabinetry with a large pantry and lower cabinet slide out shelves.  ***  Second floor with two large bedrooms, as well as expansive loft area with vaulted ceiling overlooking living room and with views of rear patio landscaping, perfect for home office or den area. Oversized primary bedroom with both walk-in and mirrored wardrobe closets and dressing area.  ***  Other features include: New Milgard dual pane vinyl windows, main level guest bath, multiple linen and guest closets, included washer & dryer in 2nd floor closet, plantation shutters and attached two car garage.  *** Association features include: Two additional pools, three tennis courts, guest parking throughout complex, onsite professional management, security patrol, basic cable with wifi, monthly pest control service and Community recreation room with large entertainment area and kitchen, pool & ping pong tables, full gym, men's and woman's dressing rooms as well as a sauna.  ***  Additionally, the community recently completed a major exterior renovation project spending in excess of five million dollars. In addition to major exterior renovation, seller upgraded to the Milgard windows, at a cost of $14,000.

column434: Nestled in the highly sought-after Walnut Cove enclave of homes in Northridge, this charming mid-century ranch home offers a timeless blend of classic character and thoughtful modern updates. Located in a warm, community-oriented neighborhood of well-cared-for homes, this inviting residence features 4-spacious bedrooms, 2-bathrooms, and a private backyard retreat with a sparkling pool—perfect for enjoying the relaxed California lifestyle.  A welcoming front porch sets the tone for the home’s inviting interior, where hardwood floors, mid-century design touches, and tasteful updates create a bright and comfortable living environment. The updated kitchen is ideal for any home cook, boasting granite countertops, ample cabinetry, a sunny breakfast nook, and a full suite of appliances including a gas range, electric oven, and dishwasher. A separate laundry room with storage and side-yard access adds convenience.  The spacious living room offers the perfect space for relaxing or entertaining, featuring a cozy fireplace, recessed lighting, and a large sliding glass door that opens to the backyard for easy indoor-outdoor living. For more formal gatherings, the separate dining room showcases plantation shutters and recessed lighting, providing a refined setting for hosting.  The primary suite is a peaceful retreat with beamed ceilings, dual mirrored closets, recessed lighting, and an en suite bathroom with a tiled shower-over-tub. Three additional bedrooms are bright and comfortable, each with hardwood floors and generous closet space. A full hallway bath with vanity and shower-over-tub serves the secondary bedrooms.  Outdoors, enjoy a private north-facing backyard that welcomes morning sun and afternoon shade—perfect for quiet mornings, evening dining, or lounging by the sparkling pool. Mature landscaping and a covered patio enhance the tranquil setting.  Additional highlights include dual-pane windows (most), raised panel doors, central air and heat, copper plumbing (most), a 200-amp electrical panel, composition roof and an updated sewer line.  Conveniently located near CSUN, schools, shopping, dining, and major freeways, this special home perfectly combines vintage charm, modern comfort, and everyday convenience. Some photos have been virtually staged.

column434: Seller says, “Let’s get moving!” Price adjustment! Welcome to this Walnut Cove beauty at the end of the most quiet Cul de Sac in Northridge. As you drive up the street, you’ll notice the stacked stone archway entry leading to the double door with smoked glass and inlay of wrought iron, to match the wrought iron railing on the private patio. There’s a custom wooden garage door to give the home an Estate appearance. As you enter the double doors you’ll notice the Bamboo floors leading through the entire home with crown molding and baseboards.  Three bedrooms and two full baths included in 1,700 sf of living space on a lot size of nearly 7,700 sf. Smooth ceilings and recessed lighting give this home a luxurious effect.  The cook’s kitchen is going to enjoy the all stainless appliances with 5 burner stove and built in microwave all from Samsung. Deep double stainless sink with stainless modern fixtues with solid walnut cabinets with pull out spice drawer. Convenient walk in pantry and laundry off kitchen. Nicely located dining area with archway leads to living room with wood burning tile fireplace and hearth and wood mantle over the fireplace.  Master bedroom has walk in closet, ceiling fan and master bath is tiled with full glass enclosure tub.  Granite counters and smoked glass door with wrought iron inlay leading to private balcony. Guest bedroom with large closet and organizer and bead board wainscoting and ceiling fan. Full guest bath with laminate floor, tile counter and pewter fixures. Dual pane vinyl slider leads to entertainer’s private backyard with slate floors, huge gas firepit and waterfall all covered with shaded nine foot high ceilings and columns.

column434: *REDUCED PRICE* Charming Single-Story Stunner, offering MOVE-IN-READY convenience in a desirable Northridge neighborhood close to shopping centers, hospitals, restaurants, CSUN and great academic schools. Featuring 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and nearly 1,568 sq ft of refined living space, this home sits on an expansive 7,185 sq ft lot. Step through double entry doors into a breathtaking foyer featuring elegant marble flooring that flows through the hallway and bathrooms. Gleaming cherry hardwood floors grace the main living areas, complemented by soaring high ceilings in the living room, creating an airy and sophisticated ambiance. The beautifully appointed kitchen boasts granite countertops, stainless steel appliances (all included), and ample cabinetry. Indulge in beautifully designed bathrooms with complete marble countertops and shower backsplashes. Enjoy seamless indoor-outdoor living with surround sound system connections both inside and out, perfect for hosting gatherings. Relax by the stunning sparkling pool with backyard pergola, ideal for entertaining friends and family. The property is enveloped by professionally landscaped gardens, illuminated by Malibu Garden lights for enchanting evenings. Embrace a lifestyle of elegance and comfort of this property. Schedule a private tour today to experience this exceptional property!

There is also room to build an ADU or guest house, plus ample parking with space for an RV.

column434: Absolutely gorgeous single story home with 5 Bedrooms, 3 Bathrooms, 3,189 Sq.Ft. of living space, on a 16,992 Sq.Ft. Lot, with attached 2 car garage, possible RV parking, pool and spa. Exquisite curb appeal with palm trees and lots of driveway space for parking and possible RV, with brick ribbon walkways. Beautiful (leaded glass) double door entry leads you to the foyer overlooking the formal living room with 4 custom curio cabinets with glass shelves and lighting. The formal living room has high ceilings, plenty of natural light, elegant fireplace, and is open to the large dining room. Family room with built-in book shelves, two skylights, attached office space with French doors, custom cabinets and a sliding door to the sun room. Kitchen with plenty of storage, Center Island, stovetop with separate indoor grill, Maytag dishwasher, trash compactor, KitchenAid ovens, large breakfast area and opens to a covered patio outside. 5 bedrooms total (4 on the West side of the house including the primary and 1 bedroom and bathroom off of the kitchen). Extra-large primary bedroom with built-in closets, cabinets, and drawers plus a built-in sauna. Ensuite primary bathroom with 2 sinks, lots of countertop space, and custom step up spa tub with glass shower enclosure. All bedrooms of good size. Hallway bathroom with pocket door separating the shower with tub from the sinks area (so two people can use it at once). Inside laundry room. Gorgeous backyard with mature landscaping, brick ribbon gated pool and spa, park like grass area, large side yard, and covered patio make this a perfect backyard for entertaining. Located in the award winning Granada Hills Charter High School district.

column434: Suburban-Style Living in the Heart of the City! Welcome to this ranch-style stunner, offering the perfect blend of comfort, luxury, and functionality. This one-of-a-kind property features 3 bedrooms + 2 bathrooms + a retreat/office and indoor laundry, PLUS an attached 1 bed/1 bath ADU with its own private fireplace, kitchen, and laundry — ideal for rental income (potential income $2800/mo), guests, or private workspace. The oversized lot features a circular stamped-concrete driveway, detached 2-car garage, double RV/boat parking, and private backyard oasis that truly defines “Entertainer’s Paradise.” The main home includes a custom oak cocktail bar, built-in family room cabinetry, wainscoting, solid alder interior doors, and custom hardwood floors. Recent and new updates include carpet, recessed LED lights, ceiling fans, soft-close cabinets and drawers, Nordic tankless water heater, paint (inside and out), carriage lights, tile flooring in the ADU bath,  A/C units (5-ton main + 2-ton ADU), and a 40 panel OWNED solar system. The primary bedroom retreat offers direct access to a rose garden and backyard oasis, and a spa-inspired ensuite with a jacuzzi jet tub. Outdoors, this property shines with lush landscaping, brick masonry, mature trees, privacy hedges, a secluded patio and “secret garden.” Entertain year-round in your resort-style backyard featuring a pool with waterfalls, spillovers, swim-up bar, a large jetted spa with seating for 10+, a step-down firepit with glass rocks & built-in seating and an outdoor gas fireplace. Enjoy the beautiful California weather by having all your largest gatherings outside. The massive covered outdoor kitchen will accommodate preparing meals for your biggest dinner parties or BBQ’s and comes equipped with high end Viking stainless appliances, including a built-in BBQ, oven, side burners, kegerator, prep kitchen, beverage fridge and dual sinks. It has a stone bar with seating for 8–10, and custom tile finishes. Located in the Granada Hills Charter School district (LAUSD), this property is wheelchair accessible, was the former model and with over 2800 sq ft is one of  the largest homes on the block. Don’t miss this rare opportunity to own a truly special home that brings suburban tranquility to city living—it’s move-in ready, energy-efficient, and completely unforgettable!

A second living room on the lower level offers a full wet bar, Italian-inspired fireplace, and custom sliding doors leading to the breathtaking backyard.Step outside to your private oasis, where travertine floors, an expansive patio, and a full outdoor kitchen create the ultimate indoor-outdoor living experience. Take a dip in the sparkling pool, surrounded by lush greenery and resort-style landscaping. The luxurious primary suite features a private balcony, generous walk-in closet, sunken jetted tub, glass-enclosed shower, and dual vanities with a makeup counter. With two additional bedrooms upstairs and two on the lower level, this home offers ample privacy and space for family and guests. Owned Solar! A custom 3-car garage with a workbench and storage completes this extraordinary home. This estate truly has it all elegance, space, and resort-style living! Don't miss this rare opportunity! column434: Tucked away at the end of a tranquil cul-de-sac, this 5,453-square-foot residence captures the essence of modern luxury reimagined within a timeless traditional framework. Set on an expansive 11,380-square-foot lot, the home has undergone a meticulous, comprehensive renovation transforming it into a masterful blend of craftsmanship, comfort, and understated sophistication. Behind its stately facade lies a beautifully balanced floor plan curated for both grand entertaining and intimate everyday living. The formal living and dining rooms evoke a sense of occasion, while the great room anchored by a stunning new chef's kitchen flows effortlessly into the expansive family room overlooking the pool and gardens. The kitchen showcases custom cabinetry, quartz surfaces, and a suite of integrated Fisher & Paykel appliances, offering both elegance and performance in equal measure. Upstairs, the primary suite serves as a serene retreat, boasting generous proportions, spa-like amenities, and soft natural light. Four additional bedrooms complete the upper level, providing ample space for family or guests. Every bathroom throughout the home has been entirely reimagined, featuring refined finishes and timeless materials. Throughout, you'll find wide-plank white oak floors, freshly painted interiors, and a new roof testament to the home's turn-key condition. Step outside to discover the newly refinished Pebble Tec pool, set within a private backyard oasis perfect for entertaining under the California sun. Situated in one of Northridge's most desirable pockets, this cul-de-sac estate offers the rare combination of space, sophistication, and serenity an ideal sanctuary for the discerning family seeking the comforts of luxury living in the heart of the Valley.

The main level welcomes you with an open-concept living area featuring a cozy fireplace, beautiful hardwood floors, and recessed lighting throughout. The contemporary kitchen offers granite countertops, a generous island with breakfast bar seating, and opens seamlessly to the dining space. A convenient half bath for guests completes the first-floor layout. Step outside to your private backyard patio—ideal for enjoying morning coffee or hosting gatherings with friends and family. Upstairs, the versatile loft (designed as the 4th bedroom with a built-in closet provision) offers remarkable flexibility—perfect as a family room, home office, or easily convertible into an additional bedroom to fit your needs. The primary suite provides a peaceful retreat with a spacious walk-in closet and an en-suite bathroom. Three additional well-sized bedrooms, a full bath, and a laundry room offer comfort and convenience. Additional features include central air and heating for year-round comfort, an attached 2-car garage, and a low-maintenance backyard. Conveniently located near the 5, 210, and 118 freeways for easy commuting access.

column434: Welcome to 11465 Fox Hollow Lane, a VA Loan Approved Property—a meticulously cared for residence nestled in the desirable California Glen gated with a 24-hour guarded community. This 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath home boasts 1,926 square feet of luxurious living space, offering a refined blend of elegance, comfort, and functionality. You’ll be captivated by its curb appeal and lush trees—all set in a quiet, family-friendly cul-de-sac. Step through the front door and be greeted by sunlight-drenched interiors and Calcutta marble flooring that runs throughout the formal living and dining areas, creating a bright, airy, and opulent atmosphere.  The formal living room is adorned with designer mirrors, crown molding, and a white brick fireplace. Just beyond, the dining area showcases a custom Chandelier and two French doors that lead to your private backyard oasis. Back inside, the kitchen is warm and cheerful, featuring white cabinetry, tile countertops, and a large garden window that brings in plenty of natural light. Equipped with a stove, built-in microwave, and ample pantry storage, this kitchen is ideal for the home chef who loves to cook and entertain: a convenient breakfast bar and adjacent dining nook offer casual dining options for busy mornings or intimate evenings. The family room is designed for comfort and entertainment, featuring plush leather seating, built-in cabinetry, and a wet bar with rich, deep mahogany tones and classic, carved detailing on the front panels, showcasing artisan craftsmanship and a vintage appeal. A striking curved staircase with rich wood handrails and classic white balusters, and a grand chandelier that leads upstairs. All three bedrooms, including a master suite with its private bathroom, walk-in closet, and a charming window bench—the perfect cozy reading spot. The additional two bedrooms are light-filled and spacious, ideal for guests, children, or a home office set up.. Comfort is key here, which is why this home is equipped with central air conditioning and a Nest thermostat, ensuring year-round comfort and convenience. Additionally, it features a hidden washer and dryer closet. Wait—this isn’t just a home; it’s a lifestyle. California Glen is one of Pacoima’s hidden gems, offering residents 24-hour guard-gated security, beautifully maintained grounds, and access to a sparkling community swimming pool and spa. Located near major freeways, local parks, shopping centers, and more....

The family room is designed for comfort and entertainment, featuring plush leather seating, built-in cabinetry, and a wet bar with rich, deep mahogany tones and classic, carved detailing on the front panels, showcasing artisan craftsmanship and a vintage appeal. A striking curved staircase with rich wood handrails and classic white balusters, and a grand chandelier that leads upstairs. All three bedrooms, including a master suite with its private bathroom, walk-in closet, and a charming window bench—the perfect cozy reading spot. The additional two bedrooms are light-filled and spacious, ideal for guests, children, or a home office set up.. Comfort is key here, which is why this home is equipped with central air conditioning and a Nest thermostat, ensuring year-round comfort and convenience. Additionally, it features a hidden washer and dryer closet. Wait—this isn’t just a home; it’s a lifestyle. California Glen is one of Pacoima’s hidden gems, offering residents 24-hour guard-gated security, beautifully maintained grounds, and access to a sparkling community swimming pool and spa. Located near major freeways, local parks, shopping centers, and more....

column434: Modern Comfort. Prime Location. No HOA! Discover this beautifully appointed 4-bedroom, 2.5-bath residence that blends modern design with energy-efficient living—perfectly suited for today’s lifestyle. Step inside to an open-concept floor plan enhanced by soaring ceilings, recessed lighting, and stylish flooring—tile throughout the main level and wood-look flooring from the staircase upward. The heart of the home is a thoughtfully designed kitchen featuring sleek granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, a breakfast bar, and abundant cabinetry for all your storage needs. Upstairs, you’ll find all four bedrooms, including a spacious primary suite complete with a walk-in closet and generous natural light. A versatile loft with dual skylights offers the ideal space for a home office, media room, or even a potential fifth bedroom. Enjoy year-round comfort and savings with Solar Panels and central HVAC. Outdoor living is effortless with a private, low-maintenance yard and aluminum patio cover—perfect for relaxing or entertaining. Additional highlights include smart under-stair storage and a side-by-side two-car garage with direct access. Nestled in a quiet, private enclave with unbeatable convenience—just minutes from Costco, Food For Less, Target, Best Buy, Home Depot, and major medical centers like UCLA Olive View. Commuters will appreciate easy access to the 5, 118, and 210 freeways, while nature lovers can enjoy nearby Hansen Dam Recreation Park and Golf Course. Turnkey, energy-smart, and move-in ready—this home checks all the boxes!

column434: Nestled in a cul-de-sac, this 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home is perfect for first time buyers or investors and offers a functional layout and valuable features throughout. Enjoy the convenience of an automatic sliding gate with a two-car garage with automatic doors, a two-car carport, and additional driveway space make ample parking space for 6-8 vehicles. Inside, the home features tile flooring in the kitchen and bathrooms, with laminate flooring in the living room and throughout the home. Both the hallway and primary bedroom bathrooms have been tastefully updated. The kitchen includes granite countertops, backsplash, a pantry and an interior bonus area for laundry and storage, which adds everyday convenience.  There's also a bonus room that offers flexibility and can be used as a 4th bedroom, guest room or even converted into an income-generating rental room. The expansive, easy-care backyard offers endless possibilities- add a pool, expand the home, ADU project or create the perfect space for relaxing and entertaining. Additional upgrades include 24 solar panels (will be fully paid off prior to closing), to keep your electricity bill low and keep your home cool with newer HVAC unit, with Wi-Fi control and updated electrical outlets. Home is close to Hwy 118 and minutes from the 5, 170, 405 and 210 freeways. Close by is shopping, Costco, shops, restaurants, parks and public pools.

Perfectly situated near Hansen Dam Park, Discovery Cube Science Center, scenic hiking trails, golf courses, shopping, and dining—with easy freeway access to the 118, 5, and 210—this home delivers the ideal combination of comfort, convenience, and opportunity.

column434: Cozy 1 bedroom 1 bathroom featuring 752 sqft of living space, Move-in ready, well-kept condominium in Panorama City! Perfect for first time buyers & or investors. This condo features a beautiful view of the courtyard and pool, allowing you to enjoy the quiet & serene surroundings 24/7, light & bright natural light coming from Large Picture Window! Living room with "wood floors looking" ceramic tiles easy to clean and maintain. Unit has an open layout connecting the living, dining, and kitchen together, it is the perfect floorplan for entertaining family or guests. column434: Ready to Move In! Charming 2-Bedroom, 1-Bathroom Condo in Prime Panorama City Location. Welcome to this beautifully updated 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom condominium at 9600 Van Nuys Blvd, offering comfortable living space in one of Panorama City’s most convenient neighborhoods. The moment you step inside, you'll be greeted by an abundance of natural light that fills the open concept living and dining area, creating a bright and welcoming atmosphere throughout. The well-designed kitchen features ample cabinet space and a breakfast bar, perfect for enjoying casual meals or entertaining guests. You'll appreciate the added convenience of an in-unit laundry area, making laundry day a breeze. Additionally, this unit comes with a 2-car garage space, offering secure parking and extra storage. Location is everything! Situated along Van Nuys Blvd, this condo places you just minutes away from Panorama Mall, Plaza del Valle, and a wide variety of local shops and dining options. With easy access to public transportation and major freeways, commuting across the San Fernando Valley and beyond is effortless. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity—this move-in ready condo won’t last long!

column434: Just Remodeled! Two-story townhome style condo with 2 parking, located in a quiet gated small complex with only 17 units. 2 bedrooms 1 and 1/2 bathroom, legal laundry in the unit   with stainless steel appliances, new kitchen cabinets with quarts countertops, recessed lightings,  central AC & Heather, private patio.  Fantastic location near freeways, shopping, and dining, this ready to move in  home offers it all. Don’t miss your opportunity to make it yours! Low HOA fee only $300. Prospective buyers qualify for $15,000 towards their closing costs, rate buy-down or even down payment via this program and avoid seller credits! Even well qualified buyers understand the value of $15k in savings, plus this program can be combined with our exclusive $0 down conventional loan (with no mortgage insurance) for those that need a little extra help with down payment.  This listing qualifies because it's located in a census tract that is considered a "historically underserved" area of Los Angeles County and we want to help promote homeownership in this area. To determine area need, we look at the following:  Considered "low" or "moderate" income area and/or > 50% minority residents (this neighborhood is 92.20%) or  Both!. Bonus rate discount: Each of the above criteria also qualifies the home for additional rate discounts - up to .625% off the buyer's qualifying interest rate depending on location and buyer qualifications.

column434: Located in a desirable Panorama City community, this freshly remodeled three-bedroom, three-bath townhouse-style home combines spacious living, modern finishes, and resort-style amenities in one turnkey package. With approximately 1,402 square feet of interior space, the home welcomes you with wide-plank wood-style floors, crisp white walls, and recessed lighting that creates an airy, gallery-like feel. The open-concept living area features a sleek fireplace, large windows with soft natural light, and seamless flow to the dining space, creating an inviting atmosphere for everyday living or entertaining. The updated kitchen boasts white shaker cabinetry, quartz-style countertops, stainless steel appliances including a gas range with statement hood, and a floating wood shelf for warmth and display. Upstairs, three well-proportioned bedrooms offer plush carpeting, generous closet space, and abundant light. The primary suite includes an en-suite bath, ample storage, and enough room for a king bed plus a seating area or desk, while the secondary bedrooms are perfect for guests, family, or a home office. Each bathroom has been thoughtfully upgraded with modern vanities, sleek fixtures, and neutral palettes that evoke a spa-like feel. Practical features include a powder bath on the main level, multiple storage closets, and convenient in-unit laundry connections. A rare direct-access private two-car garage adds security and ease, making this residence feel like a true single-family home. The well-maintained complex offers a sparkling pool and spa with sunny lounge areas, mature landscaping, and well-run HOA services that provide an attractive, low-maintenance environment year-round. Residents appreciate the community's proximity to the revitalizing Van Nuys Corridor, local parks, and a variety of shopping and dining options, as well as easy access to major freeways for streamlined commutes. Nearby Sherman Oaks, North Hollywood, and the Valley's emerging hot spots provide endless choices for nightlife, fitness, and entertainment, while the neighborhood retains a peaceful residential feel with tree-lined streets and a welcoming atmosphere. Combining style, comfort, and convenience, 14500 Van Nuys Blvd #33 is a move-in-ready home offering the best of townhome living in a prime Panorama City location with every amenity close at hand. Photos have been virtually staged.

column434: Welcome to this beautifully maintained tri-level single-family home nestled in a desirable gated community. Built just 8 years ago and offering 1,613 square feet of thoughtfully designed living space, this 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom residence blends comfort, style, and efficiency, including fully paid-off solar panels! Step through the gated front porch into a formal entry that sets the tone for the rest of the home. The first level features an attached 2-car garage that opens into a versatile flex room, perfect as a home office, gym, or guest retreat. Upstairs on the second level, you'll find an inviting open-concept layout that seamlessly connects the formal dining room, spacious living area, and a chef-inspired kitchen. The kitchen is a true showstopper, complete with a large center island, sleek white cabinetry, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, and recessed lighting. A charming outdoor patio is just off the living space, ideal for morning coffee or evening relaxation. The third level is home to two main bedrooms, each offering walk-in closets and en-suite bathrooms with quartz countertops and walk-in showers. A dream primary suite awaits, and the layout smartly separates the bedrooms with convenient utility and laundry closets. Throughout the home, you'll find wood-toned laminate flooring in the living areas, tile in the bathrooms, and cozy carpet in the bedrooms, stairs, and hallway. Wired for surround sound, this home enhances your lifestyle with an upgraded audio experience throughout. Enjoy year-round comfort with central heating and air, and take full advantage of the gated community's amenities, including a private park, BBQ area, and a playground tucked at the rear of the neighborhood. Don't miss this rare opportunity to own a modern, energy-efficient home with exceptional features and flexible living space!

column434: PRICE REDUCED TO SELL!  Welcome to this beautifully maintained, MOVE-IN READY,  3 bedroom, 2.5 bath home,  a rare find in a pocket of newer built homes in the City of Panorama.  Although the property is legally classified as a detached condo, it looks and offers the feel and functionality of a single family residence. Very low HOA fee. HOA has not increased fees since seller purchased property in 2007. The home features high ceiling, an inviting open floor plan, central AC, window shutters all throughout and new engineered/laminated flooring on the stairs and in all upper level rooms.  The main floor consists of the powder room, the living room and the kitchen with granite countertops, abundant cabinetry, stainless steel appliances and a spacious dining area.  Upstairs, you'll find a spacious master bedroom suite with a walk-in closet, with separate toilet and bath. Also on the 2nd floor are two good size bedrooms, a bathroom and a convenient laundry room.  Additional improvements include a backyard with brick-paved flooring, a detached  gazebo and a big storage shed.  There is a 2 car attached garage and a beautiful front lawn covered with maintenance free synthetic grass.  Other enhancements include CCTV in the driveway, front main door and back of the house, Nest thermostat for AC and heater, all of which can be controlled remotely.  Don't miss the opportunity to make this home yours.

column434: QUALIFIES FOR THE COMMUNITY ADVANTAGE LENDING PROGRAM! - 2% BACK TO BUYER + $1500 BACK FOR CLOSING COSTS, NO PMI, AS LITTLE AS 3% DOWN, RATES IN THE MID 5%'s: FOR ANY BUYER!!! Step into your modern dream home, an impeccably designed, small-lot new construction residence nestled within a gated community in the vibrant metropolitan hub of Panorama City, Los Angeles. Spanning three levels, this contemporary masterpiece offers the perfect blend of style, functionality, and comfort. Boasting 3 spacious bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms, and a versatile flex space ideal for a home office or creative studio, this home is tailored to meet the demands of modern urban living. The open-concept layout flows effortlessly from room to room, enhanced by abundant natural light and high ceilings that add to the airy, expansive feel. Every detail has been carefully curated to reflect contemporary luxury from the high-quality laminate flooring that runs throughout the main living spaces to the sleek stainless steel appliances in the chef-inspired kitchen. Whether you're entertaining guests or enjoying a quiet night in, the design and finishes speak to refined taste and everyday elegance.Enjoy the convenience of a private patio, perfect for morning coffee, alfresco dining, or a serene moment outdoors. Tech-forward amenities include a Level 2 EV charger, fiber optic pre-wiring for ultra-fast internet, and a pre-run conduit for solar installation, offering both sustainability and future-ready infrastructure along with the transferable builder warranty. Situated across from Tobias Avenue Park, you'll have green space just steps from your front door. Daily essentials are never far, with nearby access to grocery stores, shopping centers, and diverse restaurants. Commuting is a breeze with quick access to the 405, 118, and 5 freeways, connecting you easily to the rest of Los Angeles. Whether you're a first-time buyer, investor, or looking to upgrade your lifestyle, this home is a modern sanctuary crafted for convenience, beauty, and high-performance living. Don't miss your chance to own this piece of contemporary paradise.

column434: Welcome to modern, completely turn-key detached townhome for sale. This elegant, property is setting the standard for Living in Panorama City. The home was built in 2018 and offers all the accommodations and benefits of newer construction.  As you first walk in you will appreciate the functionality of the open floor plan, an attached garage and the high ceilings. The first floor includes a large, bright living room with a fireplace, open and modern kitchen, walk-in pantry, guest bathroom and panty of storage under the stairs. Upgraded kitchen features energy star stainless-steel appliances, dark custom-built cabinets with white quartz countertops and grey subway tile backsplash. The sliding doors from the living room lead to a private landscaped backyard perfect for a quiet evening or entertaining friends and family. Second floor includes 2 master suites, main master has fireplace, walk-in closet, sliding doors to a balcony with amazing panoramic views, another 2 bedrooms and a bath, large closets, stackable washer/dryer laundry. Additional features include water-resistant laminate flooring and skylights through out the house, electric charger for EV vehicle in the garage, tankless water heater, 5 ton A/C unit.   This property sits on the corner section of the 12 unit luxury, well-maintained community with low HOA fees. Neighborhood is close to popular shopping, restaurants, top-rated schools, and easy access to freeways 405 and 5. Motivated Seller! Bring your Offer!

column434: Welcome to a home that offers timeless charm, thoughtful upgrades, and a layout that works for every stage of life. Whether you're upsizing, downsizing, or simply right-sizing into your forever home, this 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom single-story residence checks all the boxes. Upgrades include stainless steel appliances with a Fisher & Paykel 5-burner cooktop, copper plumbing, new sewer piping under the house, a new pool pump, fresh exterior paint, and a spacious driveway with ample parking. Inside, you'll find warm hardwood floors, elegant crown molding, and a cozy fireplace that anchors the inviting living space. Skylights bring in beautiful natural light, while custom paint and wallpaper accents add just the right touch of personality. The flexible floor plan offers four generously sized bedrooms, including one currently used as a bright and creative art space. The sunroom has been reimagined as a game and lounge room, perfect for entertaining family and friends. Step outside to a private deck off the back bedroom, ideal for your morning coffee or a quiet evening unwind. A dedicated laundry area with access to the second bathroom leads directly to the side yard for convenient pool access. The backyard is a true retreat, featuring a sparkling pool, mature citrus trees, and a custom vinyl fence, perfect for relaxing afternoons or family get-togethers. Tucked into a peaceful neighborhood with easy access to the 5, 405, and 118 freeways, and just minutes from CSUN, shopping, and dining, this home offers the ideal blend of comfort, functionality, and long-term livability. Don’t miss this rare opportunity to settle into a home that’s ready to grow and evolve with you. Schedule your private showing today!

Conveniently located near restaurants, shopping, parks, schools, and major commuter routes, this property is perfect for families and professionals alike. Don’t miss out on this move-in-ready treasure—schedule a private tour today to experience all that this home has to offer!

column434: This is the investment property you have been waiting for all year! Welcome to this Panorama City treasure located on a quiet cul-de-sac with undeniable curb appeal and beautiful mature palms. This property offers TWO completely separate homes on one lot with the potential to expand MORE, located on one expansive corner lot, creating the ultimate blend of privacy, income potential, multigenerational living, and an incredible investment opportunity! The main home spans approx. 2,040 sq. ft. with 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms adorned with much of its original charm, well maintained and in move-in condition—yet waiting for the perfect family to bring their vision and customize every detail to their liking. Inside, you’ll find spacious and functional floorplan, a bright living room with a cozy fireplace, a functional kitchen with brand-new stainless steel appliances, recessed lighting, and generously sized bedrooms. The functional backyard and multiple private access points throughout the main home create opportunities for additional expansion or reconfiguration, perfect for large families or additional income opportunities. And the driveway guides you to the attached 2-car garage adding convenience and additional conversion potential. This home offers a solid foundation and endless potential for its next chapter. The ADU, fully built brand new in 2019, offers 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and 1,091 sq. ft. of modern living. With recessed lighting, a stylish kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, and generously sized bedrooms with mirrored closets and ceiling fans, tankless water heater, separate laundry area, an iron electric gate opens to a generous driveway, while the spacious side and backyard provide mature lemon trees  and the perfect setting for outdoor living and entertaining! This spacious home is functional, and ready to enjoy. Situated on a 12,844 sq. ft. corner lot, each home enjoys its own private entrance and address. Centrally located near shopping, dining, and everyday conveniences, this property is the rare opportunity that investors, extended families, and future planners dream of. *Photos include virtual staging, digitally enhanced furnishings, and landscaping. These images are provided for illustrative purposes only to help envision potential use of the space. The property will be delivered in its current condition unenhanced, please refer to ALL photos included.*

column434: Tucked away in a peaceful neighborhood, this beautifully remodeled residence blends timeless charm with modern comforts in one of the area's most desirable neighborhoods. Recent upgrades include a brand-new kitchen and bathrooms, fresh interior paint, and stylish new flooring throughout. The flexible layout is both functional and inviting, featuring a spacious primary suite on the lower level, a cozy family room, and an expansive living room centered around a striking mid-century fireplace. The home feels grand yet warm, offering an ideal balance for both everyday living and entertaining. The kitchen is a true showstopper, equipped with an island, brand-new appliances, and an adjoining dining room that creates a seamless flow for hosting and gathering. Step outside to a private backyard oasis with a lush lawn, fruitful lemon trees, a generous side yard, perfect for weekend barbecues or peaceful mornings in the sun. Located near top-rated schools, including Beckford, Nobel, and Granada Hills Charter, and just minutes from the new Vineyards shopping center and Porter Ranch Park, this home offers the complete package of lifestyle, comfort, and location.

column434: Discover your dream home in the heart of Sylmar’s highly desirable Rancho Cascades neighborhood! This charming single story residence features 4 bed 2 bath and 2,361 sq. ft. of living space, plus an additional bonus room of approximately 300 sq. ft. Situated on a quiet cul-de-sac, the property offers both privacy and comfort. As you approach the home, you will be welcomed by a cozy outdoor patio surrounded by lush greenery. Inside a spacious living and dining area with high vaulted ceilings creates a warm and inviting atmosphere perfect for family gatherings or entertaining guests. The large kitchen is filled with natural light and offers plenty of storage, stainless steel appliances, and access to the bonus room that could be used as a game room or a home office.  The hallway will lead you to the bedrooms, bathroom and very spacious primary bedroom with a large bathroom and a walk in closet. Down the hallway, you will find the secondary bedrooms, a full bathroom, and a very spacious primary suite featuring a walk in closet and a large en suite bathroom. The exterior of the property is rich with landscaping, fruit trees and a sparkling swimming pool.  The property sits on an expansive 17,613 sq. ft. lot with alley access, offering ADU potential. The detached 3-car garage (approximately 600 sq. ft.) also presents a great opportunity for a JADU conversion. Conveniently located near Olive View UCLA Medical Center, Saddletree Ranch Trailhead, and major freeways, this home combines suburban peace with urban accessibility.

Living room and hallway have brand new waterproof flooring, bathroom has been tastefully updated with modern finishes to create a spa-like atmosphere. The spacious primary bedroom includes a walk-in closet and direct access to a second small patio. Recently painted throughout the property. Other highlights include tandem two-car covered parking, a community pool and hot tub, community laundry facilities, and a recreation room. Situated just minutes from freeways, public transportation, and local shops, this home offers both convenience and a wonderful lifestyle. Don’t miss out!

column434: Desirable three-level townhome located in the city of San Fernando. This property features two bedrooms, including a spacious main bedroom with a walk-in closet and a private balcony that overlooks the green central area of the complex garden and pool. The good-sized second bedroom shares a full bathroom with the main bedroom on the third floor. On the main level, the living room is filled with natural light and includes a gas fireplace, perfect for gatherings during the winter. The dining area opens up to a small private patio, ideal for BBQs. The kitchen is bright and offers plenty of cabinet space, along with an additional closet that can be used as a pantry. There is also a guest bathroom on the second floor. The townhome includes an attached two-car garage on the first floor and a large storage area. The complex provides amenities such as a community pool, spa, grassy lawn, and BBQ area. Conveniently located near shopping areas, restaurants, and bus stops, this property is must-see.

column434: Welcome to this delightful single-story home in San Fernando, offering charm, functionality, and incredible potential for those looking to make it their own. RESIDENCE: Situated on a generous ± 6,748 SF lot, this 3-bedroom, 1.75-bath home spans ±1,122 SF of comfortable living space. The thoughtfully designed floor plan includes a bright family room, an inviting dining area, and a cozy kitchen with plenty of storage. A bonus area at the rear of the home provides flexible functionality, perfect as a home office, playroom, or workout area. The primary bedroom includes an en suite bath for added privacy, while the guest bath conveniently serves the rest of the home. Additional features include central air and heat, copper plumbing, a newer roof (approx. 8-10 years old), an enclosed exterior laundry area, and a spacious backyard shaded by a large patio cover, perfect for gatherings, play, or relaxation. REC ROOM (GARAGE CONVERSION / ADDITION): A long driveway leads to the detached garage structure that has been converted and expanded into a rec room. This versatile space currently features a 3/4 bath, two rooms, a large open area, and a kitchenette-style setup -- ideal for a creative buyer seeking a flexible layout; buyer to verify all permits and intended use. AREA: Located in a vibrant, close-knit community, this home offers easy access to freeways, parks, schools, and local eateries. Downtown San Fernando’s charming shops and restaurants are just minutes away, as are the San Fernando Mission, and convenient transit options connecting you to the greater Los Angeles area. Whether you’re a first-time buyer, an investor, or someone looking for a property with room to grow, this San Fernando gem presents an exceptional opportunity to create lasting value in one of the San Fernando Valley’s most historic and well-connected neighborhoods.

column434: This beautifully maintained home has been in the same hands for over 70 years, showing a clear pride of ownership throughout. With four bedrooms and two bathrooms, it’s completely move-in ready. Selected areas—including the kitchen, primary bedroom, living room, and the outdoor carport and trim—have been freshly painted, giving the home a bright, updated feel while maintaining its character. The roof is brand new, providing peace of mind for years to come. The spacious den includes a classic wood-burning fireplace that adds warmth and character—great for quiet evenings or hosting guests. The primary bedroom features its own bathroom and connects to an adjoining bedroom, ideal for a home office, creative space, private lounge, or nursery! On the opposite side of the house, a hallway with built-in storage leads to two additional bedrooms and a full bathroom—offering separation and flexibility for a variety of living arrangements. At the back of the home, a large screened-in bonus room provides extra living space and houses the laundry area. Whether used as a game room, studio, workshop, or relaxation space, it adds year-round usability. The backyard is designed for low-maintenance outdoor living, with a gated alley entrance, covered carport, and space for up to three vehicles. A built-in storage cupboard and mature shade tree create a peaceful setting that’s equally suited for entertaining or unwinding. Situated on a generous 7,442 sq ft lot, the home is conveniently located near parks, shopping, dining, and with easy access to the I-5. This is a rare opportunity in San Fernando—comfortable, well cared for, and ready to enjoy from day one.

column434: Charming 3-Bedroom, 2-Bath Home in the Heart of San Fernando Welcome to this inviting home perfectly situated in one of the most convenient areas of San Fernando, nestled in the heart of the San Fernando Valley. Originally a 2-bedroom floor plan, a well-designed addition created a spacious third bedroom that now serves as the primary suite. This home offers a functional and comfortable 3-bedroom, 2-bath layout ideal for families or anyone looking for flexible living space. Inside, you’ll find a bright and open floor plan with fresh interior paint, an easy flow between living areas, and plenty of natural light. The home features upgraded copper plumbing, a newer roof, and tasteful finishes throughout. The kitchen and dining areas open to the private backyard—an excellent space for entertaining, barbecuing, or simply enjoying the California sunshine. The rear bedroom and bathroom feature a private entry, providing a great setup for guests, extended family, or potential rental income opportunities. The yard offers room for outdoor enjoyment, gardening, or additional seating areas. This home is centrally located and close to shopping, restaurants, schools, and major transportation routes, providing convenience and accessibility to everything the San Fernando Valley has to offer. Don’t miss the opportunity to make this charming property your next home or investment. Property is being sold as-is. Charming Spanish-Style Home in the Heart of Historic San Fernando! Welcome to this beautifully updated Spanish-style gem located in the highly desirable city of San Fernando, CA. This move-in-ready residence offers the perfect blend of timeless character and modern upgrades, making it an exceptional opportunity for homeowners and investors alike. As you arrive, you’ll be greeted by a newer perimeter fence (installed in 2020) offering added privacy and curb appeal, along with ample front parking and a long driveway for multiple vehicles. Major system upgrades—including the roof, electrical panel, HVAC, and dual-pane energy-efficient windows—were completed in 2020 (per seller), giving you peace of mind and long-term comfort. Step inside to discover a warm and inviting interior featuring plantation shutters, custom designer paint, and elegant laminate wood flooring. The open-concept living room flows seamlessly into the oversized kitchen—ideal for entertaining family and friends. A bar-top counter creates the perfect transition to the kitchen, which boasts abundant cabinetry, stunning granite countertops, and a large center island with built-in cooktop and overhead exhaust fan—a true chef’s dream! This spacious home features three generously sized bedrooms, including a luxurious primary suite with a fully remodeled en-suite bathroom. Enjoy spa-like touches such as custom glass shower panels, a rainfall showerhead, a large LED mirror, and a dual vanity. Additional highlights include: Detached garage with unpermitted ADU potential (great for guests or rental income) Tankless water heater,Dedicated dining area,Indoor laundry room All this located in a quiet, well-established neighborhood in San Fernando—a unique city with a rich cultural history and small-town charm. Enjoy easy access to major freeways (118, 5, and 210), nearby shopping, local dining, parks, and public transit. San Fernando’s walkable downtown, excellent schools, and vibrant community events make it a wonderful place to live, work, and invest. Don’t miss this rare opportunity to own a turnkey home in one of the Valley’s most cherished cities. Schedule your private tour today!

column434: This exceptional triplex presents a rare investment opportunity, offering both immediate rental income and long-term upside in the thriving San Fernando Valley. Ideally located just steps from the vibrant Maclay corridor, the property features two 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom units and one 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom unit, providing a total of 1,743 sq ft of living space on a generous 7,104 sq ft lot with ample parking. Presented in its original condition, this diamond in the rough is a true value-add opportunity for investors ready to unlock its full potential. With no rent control, buyers have the flexibility to maximize rental income and implement future rent increases without restrictions, while the high-demand location ensures consistently strong tenant interest and low vacancy rates. Surrounded by neighborhood conveniences including bakeries, restaurants, banks, auto shops, medical clinics, and churches, the property appeals directly to renters seeking walkability and accessibility, with the added benefit of easy commuter access to major highways and public transit. Based on the lot size and existing detached 2-car garage, there is also the potential to add at least one additional unit, further increasing rental income and long-term property value. Whether you are a seasoned investor looking to expand your portfolio, considering a 1031 exchange, or a developer seeking your next project in an appreciating neighborhood, this triplex checks all the boxes for strong cash flow today and substantial appreciation tomorrow.
